programme.title: Batalha dos Impérios, (2020, Action)
programme.desc: O general romano Lucius lidera uma legião de mil soldados no país e com o comandante do protetorado das Regiões Ocidentais, Huo An, ele luta para derrotar o assassino Tiberius e restaurar a soberania da China.

programme.title: Ragnarok, (2013, Science fiction)
programme.desc: Um arqueólogo fica obcecado pelos escritos encontrados em um navio viking, que podem solucionar o mistério de Ragnarok Porém, durante suas buscas, ele acaba despertando acidentalmente um monstro gigantesco.

programme.title: A Bruxa do Cabelo Branco do Reino Lunar, (2014, Action)
programme.desc: História de dois amantes, a bruxa de cabelos brancos e o líder taoísta Zhuo Yihang e seu amor que pode mudar o destino da nação.

programme.title: As Tartarugas Ninja 2: O Segredo do Ooze, (1993, Action)
programme.desc: Tartarugas Ninja buscam novo lar nos esgotos de Nova York e enfrentam o Destruidor, que usa o Ooze para criar capangas. Com ajuda de April, Jordan e Keno, precisam detê-lo.

programme.title: Expedição Kon-Tiki, (2013, Action)
programme.desc: Em 1947, apesar do medo da água e da incapacidade de nadar, Heyerdahl decidiu testar sua teoria. Ele e cinco companheiros navegam do Peru em uma jangada de madeira construída com um design antigo.

programme.title: Motoqueiro Fantasma: Espírito de Vingança, (2012, Action)
programme.desc: Nove anos após se transformar no temido Motoqueiro Fantasma, Johnny Blaze se refugia para tentar controlar sua maldição e deixá-la escondida da maioria das pessoas. Ele leva uma vida solitária, até ser obrigado a entrar em ação novamente.

programme.title: Wu Kong - Contra a Ira dos Deuses, (2017, Action)
programme.desc: Há muitos anos, o Monte Huaguo foi destruído pelo Reino Celestial, a morada dos deuses da mitologia chinesa, deixando Sun Wu Kong, o Rei Macaco, furioso, já que o local era seu lar. Kong está decidido a confrontar aqueles que determinaram seu destino.

programme.title: Batalha dos Impérios, (2020, Action)
programme.desc: O general romano Lucius lidera uma legião de mil soldados no país e com o comandante do protetorado das Regiões Ocidentais, Huo An, ele luta para derrotar o assassino Tiberius e restaurar a soberania da China.

programme.title: Os Piratas da Rua de Baixo, (2020, Action)
programme.desc: Quando uma família de piratas se muda para a chata Sandsborough, os vizinhos não ficam muito felizes. Michiel e seu novo amigo pirata Billy tentam fazer com que a família se misture, mas seu arquiinimigo chega à cidade e planeja roubar um tesouro.

programme.title: Vingança Fatal, (2014, Action)
programme.desc: Um ex-fuzileiro naval e mestre de artes marciais busca vingança em uma cidade dominada pela Yakuza.

programme.title: O Matador - Missão Resgate, (2022, Action)
programme.desc: Quando a garota de quem ele está cuidando é sequestrada, um assassino aposentado rapidamente recupera seus instintos assassinos, incendiando a cidade.

programme.title: Punhos da Vingança, (2021, Action)
programme.desc: Em Xangai, um ex-campeão de artes marciais mistas e herdeiro de uma corporação multibilionária, se junta a uma informante da polícia, para investigar a morte de seu irmão assassinado em um torneio de boxe underground

programme.title: City Hunter: O Caçador de Encrenca, (1993, Comedy)
programme.desc: Ryu Saeba, detetive particular, busca a filha fugitiva de um empresário em um navio cruzeiro sequestrado por bandidos.

programme.title: Era uma vez na China 3, (1992, Action)
programme.desc: Mestre Wong e seus discípulos entram na 'Competição de Leão Dançante' para deter um plano de assassinato e enfrentar um oponente arrogante.

programme.title: Olhos de Dragão, (2012, Action)
programme.desc: Hong usa sua visão moral e habilidades para lutar e salvar um bairro de traficantes de drogas e policiais corruptos.

programme.title: Cão de briga, (2005, Action)
programme.desc: Criado por um mafioso (Hoskins) como um animal para ser uma máquina de matar, (Jet Li) é campeão de lutas clandestinas que ajuda pianista cego (Freeman) perseguido por criminosos.

programme.title: O Vingador Marcial, (2024, Action)
programme.desc: Depois de matar um adversário em uma luta clandestina, um campeão de artes marciais e MMA vê sua vida virar de cabeça para baixo quando uma gangue rival, em busca de vingança, mata sua esposa durante um ataque de vingança.

programme.title: Karate Girl, (2009, Action)
programme.desc: Uma estudante do ensino médio no Japão que é uma estudante de caratê arrogante, mas magistral, torna-se feroz quando se junta a uma equipe disfarçada de lutadores.

programme.title: The Ten Commandments, (1956, Drama)
programme.desc: Raised as an Egyptian prince, Moses (Charlton Heston) discovers his Hebrew heritage, hears God's call, and engages in a bitter battle with the Pharaoh Ramses (Yul Brynner) to free the Jews from slavery, leading them to the Promised Land.

programme.title: The Ladies Man, (1961, Comedy)
programme.desc: After being jilted by his gal, Herbert swears off romance and is determined to live his life as a confirmed bachelor. However, he then finds employment at a Hollywood boardinghouse for women, and the female residents go wild over the new help!

programme.title: Cinderfella, (1960, Screwball)
programme.desc: Jerry Lewis plays Cinderfella – a hard-working and honest lad mistreated by his wicked stepmother and his two boorish stepbrothers. But miracles do happen when his Fairy Godfather transforms the klutzy fella into an eligible, handsome bachelor.

programme.title: Rock-A-Bye Baby, (1957, Musical)
programme.desc: A TV repairman marries a Mexican bullfighter. Unfortunately, he dies the day after their wedding; fortunately, he managed to impregnate her. Unfortunately, she is starring in the epic called The White Virgin on the Nile.

programme.title: The Disorderly Orderly, (1964, Screwball)
programme.desc: Poor Jerome Littlefield. He wants to be a doctor, but he's incredibly squeamish. So he settles for the job of orderly at the Whitestone Sanitarium, a career move that’s guaranteed to keep the patients in stitches!

programme.title: It's a Mad, Mad, Mad, Mad World, (1963, Screwball)
programme.desc: Spencer Tracy leads a hilariously zany cast of Hollywood's greatest comedians (including Milton Berle, Sid Caesar, Ethel Merman and Mickey Rooney) as eight vacation-bound motorists set off on a mad-cap, side-splitting race to find a stolen fortune!

programme.title: That Touch of Mink, (1962, Comedy)
programme.desc: Love arrives with a splash when a handsome and eligible tycoon and a beautiful working woman meet over a curbside mud puddle. He’s enchanted by her small town ways, she’s captivated by his romantic, debonair manner.

programme.title: Houseboat, (1958, Romantic comedy)
programme.desc: This Oscar®-nominated film has the legendary Cary Grant as a government attorney who can't seem to shake his bad fortune. Living on a houseboat, widowed and left with three unruly kids, he hires Sophia Loren as a governess.

programme.title: First Blood, (1982, Action)
programme.desc: A soft-spoken Vietnam vet drifts into a small town looking for no trouble, but finds it in the form of a psychotic local sheriff who finds pleasure in hating him for no reason.

programme.title: Rambo: First Blood Part II, (1985, Action)
programme.desc: John Rambo is sent on assignment back to Southeast Asia to uncover evidence of still missing POWs, and ends up with his hands full when he comes up against Vietnamese soldiers still guarding the camps.

programme.title: Rambo III, (1988, Action)
programme.desc: Rambo refuses to join his friend and former mentor, Colonel Trautman, on a mission to Afghanistan. The mission fails and Trautman is captured by Russian troops. Now Rambo must infiltrate the Russian fortress to save his only friend.

programme.title: Shooter, (2007, Action)
programme.desc: Determined to prove his innocence in a double-cross, Bob Lee Swagger is now in a high-tension race from every law enforcement agency in the US and a shadowy organization that wants him dead.

programme.title: Braveheart, (1995, Action)
programme.desc: William Wallace, a commoner, unites the 13th Century Scots in their battle to overthrow English rule.

programme.title: Seal Team Six: The Raid on Osama Bin Laden, (2013, Action)
programme.desc: When the rumored whereabouts of Osama bin Laden are revealed, the CIA readies a team of seasoned US Navy SEALs for the mission of a lifetime.

programme.title: Walking Tall, (2004, Drama)
programme.desc: Chris Vaughn, a retired soldier who returns to his hometown only to discover the place he grew up is now overrun with crime, drugs and violence. Enlisting the help of his old pal, Chris gets elected Sheriff and fights to clean up his hometown.

programme.title: Scream 3, (2000, Horror)
programme.desc: The first film set the rules. In the sequel, the stakes got higher. In the third installment of the hit franchise SCREAM, all bets are off. It's an insidious game of horror movie mayhem with surprising twists and turns.

programme.title: Scream 4, (2011, Horror)
programme.desc: Neve Campbell, Courtney Cox, and David Arquette resurrect their famous roles in this spine-chilling sequel. Ghostface returns to Woodsboro – but it’s a new decade, with new rules.

programme.title: Scream, (2022, B-Movie Horror)
programme.desc: Twenty-five years after a streak of brutal murders shocked the quiet town of Woodsboro, a terrifying new killer resurrects the Ghostface mask.

programme.title: Scream VI, (2023, B-Movie Horror)
programme.desc: The four Woodsboro survivors have moved to New York City for a fresh start. Just as they begin to feel safe again, they receive that infamous call. Ghostface reemerges more brutal and relentless than ever, stopping at nothing to hunt them down.

programme.title: Scream, (1996, Horror)
programme.desc: After a series of mysterious deaths, an offbeat group of scary movie fans become the target of a masked killer in this smash-hit thriller from legendary director Wes Craven (A NIGHTMARE ON ELM STREET) that breathed new life into the horror genre.

programme.title: Scream 2, (1997, Horror)
programme.desc: While away at college, Sidney Prescott thought she'd finally put the terror behind her...until a copycat killer begins acting out a real-life sequel in which no one is safe, or beyond suspicion.

programme.title: Scream 3, (2000, Horror)

programme.sub-title: The Man Possessed by an Evil Spirit

programme.title: JoJo's Bizarre Adventure: Who Will Be the Judge!?
programme.desc: Jotaro returns to his normal life while keeping his "Stand" power a secret. But on the way to school one day he meets a new transfer student named Noriaki Kakyoin and sustains a strange injury.

programme.title: JoJo's Bizarre Adventure: The Curse of DIO
programme.desc: Jotaro defeats Kakyoin with his Stand power, but as he attempts to glean information from his adversary about DIO, Joseph notices a sinister connection.

programme.desc: Jotaro and his comrades are attacked by Polnareff, an assassin with a Stand called "Silver Chariot" that is capable of lightning-fast swordplay. It falls to Avdol to face down the threat using "Magician's Red."

programme.title: JoJo's Bizarre Adventure: Strength
programme.desc: Jotaro’s group is rescued when they spot a giant cargo ship, but they soon find that the only occupant is a strange orangutan. Curious, they begin to explore the ship and solve its mysteries.

programme.title: JoJo's Bizarre Adventure
programme.desc: Jotaro and his companions finally make it to a hotel in Singapore, but soon Polnareff falls into a trap set by a dangerous and brutal enemy.

programme.title: Hunter x Hunter

programme.desc: Joseph uses his Stand to generate a spirit message from a TV, only to receive a warning claiming that Kakyoin is a traitor. Meanwhile, Jotaro, Ann and Kakyoin are out exploring Singapore when Kakyoin begins acting strangely.

programme.title: JoJo's Bizarre Adventure
programme.desc: The Joestars' group arrives in India, where Polnareff is attacked by a Stand only visible through a mirror. As terrifying as it is, the Stand could also be related to his sister's murder.

programme.title: The Longest Yard, (2005, Comedy)
programme.desc: The story of a pro quarterback and former college champion and coach are asked to put together a football team of inmates to take on the guards while doing their time in prison.

programme.title: Death Wish, (1974, Action)
programme.desc: In this explosive story of revenge and urban violence, Charles Bronson plays Paul Kersey, a bleeding-heart liberal who has a change of opinion after his wife and daughter are violently attacked by a gang of thugs in their apartment.

programme.title: The Warriors, (1979, Thriller)
programme.desc: The armies of the night number 100,000; they outnumber the police 5 to 1; and tonight they're after the Warriors.

programme.title: Barbarella, (1968, Science fiction)
programme.desc: The setting is the planet Lythion in the year 40,000, when Barbarella makes a forced landing while traveling through space. She vanquishes evil in the forms of robots and monsters. She also rewards the handsome men who assist her in the adventure.

programme.title: Death Wish, (1974, Action)
programme.desc: In this explosive story of revenge and urban violence, Charles Bronson plays Paul Kersey, a bleeding-heart liberal who has a change of opinion after his wife and daughter are violently attacked by a gang of thugs in their apartment.

programme.title: The Warriors, (1979, Thriller)
programme.desc: The armies of the night number 100,000; they outnumber the police 5 to 1; and tonight they're after the Warriors.

programme.title: Rolling Thunder, (1977, Action)

programme.title: Teen Wolf, (1985, Thriller)
programme.desc: A teenage boy's incredible werewolf powers improve the quality of his life in dramatic and hilarious ways.

programme.title: Friday the 13th Part II, (1981, Horror)
programme.desc: Five years after the bloodbath at Camp Crystal, all that remains is the legend of Jason and his demented mother, who had murdered seven camp counsellors. At a nearby summer camp, the new counsellors are unconcerned about the warnings to stay away.

programme.title: Friday the 13th - Part III, (1982, Horror)
programme.desc: Ignoring Camp Crystal Lake’s bloody legacy, one by one they fall victim to the maniacal Jason who stalks them at every turn...

programme.title: Friday the 13th Part - IV: The Final Chapter, (1984, Horror)
programme.desc: After his revival in a hospital morgue, the hockey-masked murderer fixes his vengeful attention on the Jarvis family and a group of hitherto carefree teenagers.

programme.title: Friday the 13th Part V: A New Beginning, (1985, Horror)
programme.desc: This time he seems to have set his sights on the young patients at a secluded halfway house. And more than a few of his teen targets end up in half, in quarters... you name it, Jason does it.

programme.title: Friday the 13th, Part VI: Jason Lives, (1986, Horror)
programme.desc: As a child, Tommy Jarvis did what many others died trying to do. He killed Jason Vorhees, the mass murderer who terrorized the residents of Crystal Lake. But now, years later, Tommy is tormented by the fear that maybe Jason isn’t really dead.

programme.title: Friday the 13th Part VII: The New Blood, (1988, Horror)
programme.desc: Ever since homicidal maniac Jason Voorhees got trapped in chains at the bottom of Crystal Lake, the nearby summer camp has operated without a hitch... without a murder. But one of this season’s happy campers has brought along a deadly secret.

programme.title: Friday the 13th Part VIII: Jason Takes Manhattan, (1989, Horror)
programme.desc: The Big Apple’s in big trouble, as indestructible psycho-fiend Jason Voorhees hits the road to New York City - and paints the town “red.”

programme.title: Friday the 13th Part V: A New Beginning, (1985, Horror)

programme.title: The Mighty Quinn, (1989, Thriller)
programme.desc: Xavier Quinn is the police chief of a tiny Caribbean island. He is on good terms with all. When a prominent businessman is murdered, Quinn, like everyone else, believes that the killer is Maubee--a local folk hero and Quinn's childhood friend.

programme.title: Pretty In Pink, (1986, Romance)
programme.desc: She’s a high school girl from the wrong side of town. He’s the wealthy heartthrob who asks her to the prom. But as fast as their romance builds, it’s threatened by the painful reality of peer pressure.

programme.title: Some Kind of Wonderful, (1987, Romantic comedy)
programme.desc: In this story from legendary filmmaker John Hughes, Keith, Watts and Amanda prove that you've got to risk a broken heart in order to find your one true love. This unforgettable romantic comedy has laughs, romance and is truly Some Kind of Wonderful.

programme.title: Planes, Trains and Automobiles, (1987, Screwball)
programme.desc: Neal just wants to fly home to Chicago for Thanksgiving with his family. But all he gets is misery. Misery named Del Griffith — a loud mouthed salesman who leads Neal on a wild goose chase.

programme.title: Valley Girl, (1983, Romance)
programme.desc: When Valley Girl Julie (Deborah Foreman) dumps her preppy boyfriend, she unexpectedly finds love with rocker Randy (Nicolas Cage)...much to the dismay of her valley girlfriends who find Julie's punk hunk to be "grody to the max!" Fer Shure.

programme.title: Class, (1983, Romance)
programme.desc: When prep-school student Skip emboldens his shy roommate Jonathan to step outside of his dating comfort zone by dating older women he’s in for the surprise of his life when the older woman Jonathan picks up turns out to be Skip’s mother, Ellen.

programme.title: The Hurricane Heist, (2014, Action)
programme.desc: Thieves attempt a massive heist against the U.S. Treasury as a Category 5 hurricane approaches one of its Mint facilities.

programme.title: Walking Tall, (2004, Drama)
programme.desc: Chris Vaughn, a retired soldier who returns to his hometown only to discover the place he grew up is now overrun with crime, drugs and violence. Enlisting the help of his old pal, Chris gets elected Sheriff and fights to clean up his hometown.

programme.title: MAFIA, (2013, Action)
programme.desc: In the 1970s, a fierce crime boss (Ving Rhames) wreaks havoc on the streets. Detective Womack (Pam Grier) decides to put an end to this organized crime – even if it means breaking the law.

programme.title: Battle Royale, (2000, Action)
programme.desc: A group of students from a Japanese high school are forced to compete in a battle, killing one another until only one is left standing.

programme.desc: A small-time talent agent discovers an amazing boxing kangaroo and figures to use it as his stepping-stone into the big time.

programme.desc: When flesh-eating piranhas are accidentally released into a summer resort's rivers, the guests become their next meal.

programme.title: Yu-Gi-Oh!
programme.desc: It's the showdown in the sands between the bandit Bakura and his ever-growing Diabound versus the Pharaoh, Mahad the Dark Magician, and the remaining guardians of the Pharaoh!

programme.title: Yu-Gi-Oh!
programme.desc: With the help of his father's spirit, the Pharaoh and his guardians defeated the bandit Bakura's Diabound and stopped the horrible Zorc from resurrecting... or did they?

programme.title: Yu-Gi-Oh!
programme.desc: The Pharaoh's journey was more than a trip to the past, it's the greatest Shadow Game ever created. Yami Yugi and Yami Bakura's Shadow Game has already reached apocalyptic proportions, but it's only the beginning of cataclysmic events!

programme.title: Yu-Gi-Oh!
programme.desc: Zorc's incredible shadow energies have resurrected the bandit Bakura and his Diabound. With a second chance at revenge, the bandit king has broken up the Pharaoh's team so that he can divide and conquer them one at a time!

programme.title: Yu-Gi-Oh!
programme.desc: The hope of mankind rests on Yugi's shoulders as he arrives at the final temple chamber where the Pharaoh's name is located, but something unexpected is waiting for them - a sinister surprise that can cost them their lives!

programme.title: Yu-Gi-Oh!
programme.desc: After a nearly eternal slumber, the all-powerful Zorc has resurrected, plunging the world into darkness!
programme.sub-title: The Dark One Cometh: Part I

programme.title: Yu-Gi-Oh!
programme.desc: The Pharaoh and his guardians are down to their last line of defense as Shada falls victim to Zorc. The Pharaoh desperately wants to summon the three Egyptian Gods, but he can't without his Millennium Puzzle!
programme.sub-title: The Dark One Cometh: Part II

programme.title: Yu-Gi-Oh!
programme.desc: Exodia the Forbidden One couldn't defeat Zorc! Exodia was able to buy enough time for the Pharaoh to get his Millennium Puzzle back-he can now summon the almighty Egyptian Gods! It's time for the Pharaoh's counterattack in the biggest brawl.
programme.sub-title: The Dark One Cometh: Part III

programme.title: Yu-Gi-Oh!
programme.desc: The three Egyptian Gods have been defeated. The Pharaoh is severely hurt and unable to stop Zorc from setting fire to the city, but our heroes aren't giving up. It's not double vision when Seto and Kaiba transcend time to confront Zorc.
programme.sub-title: The Dark One Cometh: Part IV

programme.title: Yu-Gi-Oh!
programme.desc: The Pharaoh and Kaiba's combined strength couldn't defeat Zorc. Yugi must give the Pharaoh his name, but Yugi doesn't know how to read ancient Egyptian text. All bets are off in the final clash where Yugi must protect the past to save the future!
programme.sub-title: In the Name of the Pharaoh

programme.title: Yu-Gi-Oh!
programme.desc: Pharaoh Atem, Yugi, and friends have defeated the bandit Bakura and Zorc, but the final test still awaits! Yugi must duel Atem! As they set sail to the final dueling grounds, everyone realizes this may be the final night Yugi and Atem have together.

programme.title: Yu-Gi-Oh!
programme.desc: If Yugi defeats Atem, Yugi will prove he's ready to stand on his own, and Atem can join his friends in the world beyond. But Yugi and Atem will be separated forever.

programme.title: Yu-Gi-Oh!
programme.desc: Atem has summoned all three Egyptian Gods! What chance does Yugi have against these powerful creatures that no one has been able to defeat? Yugi better think of a strategy quickly or this duel will be over soon!

programme.title: Yu-Gi-Oh!
programme.desc: Atem still has all three Egyptian God Cards, Yugi doesn't have a single monster on the field! Yugi claims that he has a combo that will defeat the Egyptian Gods, but is he simply bragging, or does he actually have a plan?

programme.title: Yu-Gi-Oh!
programme.desc: Yugi and Atem - more than friends, closer than brothers. Will they stay together, or is it time to say goodbye? It's the final answer, the final duel, and the final time we will see our friends in the rousing conclusion to Yu-Gi-Oh!

programme.title: Yu-Gi-Oh! 5D's
programme.desc: After being sent to The Facility, Yusei befriends an odd old man who duels with a treasure deck full of ancient mystic cards.

programme.title: Yu-Gi-Oh! 5D's
programme.desc: Yusei duels the top dog at The Facility using Yanagi's treasure deck. Meanwhile, Jack learns about the mystery surrounding his Mark of the Crimson Dragon.

programme.title: Yu-Gi-Oh! 5D's
programme.desc: With Yusei still serving out his sentence at The Facility, Jack finds himself having to face off against former Turbo Duel Champion Hunter Pace in a rematch that could send Jack's career up in smoke.

programme.title: Yu-Gi-Oh! 5D's
programme.desc: After being sent to the Maximum Security Zone in The Facility, Yusei risks being permanently placed in lockdown when he decides to duel Chief Armstrong in order to win a pardon for his pal.

programme.title: Yu-Gi-Oh! 5D's
programme.desc: As the clash between Yusei and the Chief comes to a shocking conclusion, Yusei must figure out a way to win the battle before his life points get zapped to zero.

programme.title: Yu-Gi-Oh! 5D's

programme.title: Yu-Gi-Oh! 5D's

programme.title: Yu-Gi-Oh! 5D's
programme.desc: When Yusei can't remember his own name, he agrees to duel a pint-sized player named Leo in the hopes of getting his memory back.

programme.title: Yu-Gi-Oh! 5D's
programme.desc: As Leo and his pal Dexter venture into the narrows of New Domino City to find the mysterious duelist known as the Black Rose, Blister breaks out a plan to keep Yusei's friends in the Satellite Sector safe from Goodwin's goons.

programme.title: Yu-Gi-Oh! 5D's
programme.desc: The stage is set for the Fortune Cup as eight elite duelists vie for the chance to take on reigning champion Jack Atlas. However, for the Master of Ceremonies Rex Goodwin, it's not about who wins or loses.

programme.title: Yu-Gi-Oh! 5D's
programme.desc: The second duel of the Fortune Cup is about to get under way as the mysterious duelist known as the Black Rose finds herself having to face off against a medieval menace named Sir Randsborg.

programme.title: Yu-Gi-Oh! 5D's
programme.desc: With the first Turbo Duel of the Fortune Cup set to start, a surprise guest forces Yusei's competition to take an unexpected pit stop.

programme.title: Yu-Gi-Oh! 5D's
programme.desc: Director Goodwin enlists the hypnotic powers of the Professor to expose Luna as a Signer and uncover the secrets she unknowingly knows of the Duel Monsters Spirit World.
programme.sub-title: Return to the Spirit World, Part 1

programme.title: Luffy makes Caesar pay for his crimes against the children, and Smoker risks his life for a chance to see Vergo fall in battle!
programme.desc: One Piece
programme.sub-title: A Surprising Outcome! White Chase vs. Vergo!

programme.title: Law reaches the end of his epic battle with Vergo, and Luffy looks to land a devastating final blow on the murderous gasbag Caesar!
programme.desc: One Piece
programme.sub-title: Caesar's Defeat! The Powerful Grizzly Magnum!

programme.title: Word of Luffy and Law's alliance spreads throughout the world, Chopper and Brook race to stay ahead of the deadly gas, and Joker sends a team to rescue Caesar!
programme.desc: One Piece

programme.title: The laboratory crumbling around them, and time running out, Luffy, the Straw Hats, the G-5, the children and all the others make a final desperate sprint towards the one exit left off the island - but Joker has one more trick up his sleeve.
programme.desc: One Piece

programme.title: As the Straw Hats and company flee the crumbling laboratory, Caesar's desperate act of vengeance thwarts Joker's plan to forever silence his enemies!
programme.desc: One Piece
programme.sub-title: A Critical Situation! Punk Hazard Explodes!

programme.title: Franky continues his battle with Buffalo and Baby 5, Nami uses a mighty gust of wind to save the children from a deadly cloud of gas, and Usopp takes a shot at capturing Caesar!
programme.desc: One Piece

programme.title: A dragon regains his boyish form, a noble warrior once feared dead makes a shocking resurrection, and bitter enemies set aside their differences to enjoy a well-deserved feast!
programme.desc: One Piece
programme.sub-title: A Touching Reunion! Momonosuke and Kin'emon!

programme.title: The weary marines and the rescued children get teary-eyed as they say goodbye to the Straw Hats. Meanwhile, Law enters into treacherous negotiations with Joker!
programme.desc: One Piece
programme.sub-title: It's Time to Say Goodbye! Leaving Punk Hazard!

programme.title: On their way after having set out from Punk Hazard, the Straw Hats find out their next destination - just as a huge wave comes crashing down on the Sunny! But it's rough sailing for the G-5 as well, as Donflamingo arrives on the scene and wreaks havoc!
programme.desc: One Piece
programme.sub-title: The G-5 Wiped Out! Doflamingo's Sudden Attack!

programme.title: Aokiji's intercession saves Smoker and sends Joker off to rethink his strategy, leaving unanswered questions about Aokiji's current status. Meanwhile, the Straw Hats catch their breath as the Sunny makes its way through the rough seas of the New World.
programme.desc: One Piece

programme.title: Smooth seas stretch out before the Straw Hats as they leave Punk Hazard far behind -- but while they fear Donflamingo's return and prepare to face him, another foe lies in wait, whose powers could be their downfall!
programme.desc: One Piece
programme.sub-title: Caesar Goes Missing! The Pirate Alliance Makes a Sortie!

programme.title: Breed has Luffy, Trafalgar, and Chopper firmly in his grasp with his Peto-Peto power! Breed dreams of a world in which he has enslaved all the humans, but Luffy's stubborn persistence and unwillingness to cooperate may have landed him in hot water.
programme.desc: One Piece
programme.sub-title: Luffy Dies at Sea?! The Pirate Alliance Comes Apart!

programme.title: Dressrosa! Luffy and the Straw Hats divide into teams and set about their business on this passionate, enchanting island! But here, in the heart of enemy territory, danger lurks around every corner. Luffy and the others encounter a mysterious blind man.
programme.desc: One Piece
programme.sub-title: Explore! A Kingdom of Love and Passion - Dressrosa!

programme.title: Out and about in Dressrosa, Luffy and his team encounter a mysterious and powerful blind gambler - and run into trouble while his shocking powers distract everyone! Meanwhile, a major event in the Colosseum draws huge crowds.
programme.desc: One Piece
programme.sub-title: Full of Enthusiasm! The Corrida Colosseum!

programme.title: Zoro, Sanji, and Kin'emon strike off in search of the thieving fairy who has taken Zoro's sword, but Sanji finds himself mesmerized by the beautiful dancing of a gorgeous Dressrosa woman - with a deadly secret!
programme.desc: One Piece
programme.sub-title: A Dangerous Love! The Dancer Girl - Violet!

programme.title: Luffy enters the Corrida Colosseum in order to compete for Ace's Flare-Flare Fruit! But with the mightiest warriors of the New World assembled and standing in his way, the competition will not be easy. The first stage of the competition is a battle royal.
programme.desc: One Piece
programme.sub-title: A Formidable, Unknown Warrior! Here Comes Lucy!

programme.title: While the deadly battle of Block A winds down, all the onlookers in the stadium are shocked to discover the secret identity of the winner! Meanwhile, Luffy's cover may be blown as another voice from the past returns.
programme.desc: One Piece

programme.title: Luffy meets an unexpected acquaintance from the past, Bellamy, who seems to be up to no good! Meanwhile, Caesar Handover Team encounters a snag when they learn just how dangerous Green Bit is!
programme.desc: One Piece
programme.sub-title: The Fateful Reunion! Bellamy the Hyena!

programme.title: The battle heats up and the widely despised Bartolomeo takes the ring! But he'll have to contend with both the Prodence Kingdom contingent, and Dressrosa's own local favorite, Bellamy! From up above, Luffy risks having his cover blown!
programme.desc: One Piece
programme.sub-title: A Super Rookie! Bartolomeo the Cannibal!

programme.title: Don Chinjao continues to provoke Luffy, hoping to gain revenge against the grandson of his sworn enemy, Garp! But as the argument continues, Luffy risks having his cover blown, and his identity revealed! Meanwhile, the battle in Block B rages.
programme.desc: One Piece
programme.sub-title: Big Names Duke It Out! The Heated Block B Battle!

programme.title: The battle for Block B hits a crescendo as King Elizabello II prepares his devastating King Punch! But as the powerful attack becomes imminent, the Prodence Kingdom faction unravels! All that may be pointless, though.
programme.desc: One Piece
programme.sub-title: A Deadly Blow! The Astonishing King Punch!

programme.title: As the handover team approaches Green Bit, they are attacked by the fearsome fish that live off the coast of Dressrosa. But that's the least of their problems as they find the bridge to Green Bit has collapsed!
programme.desc: One Piece
programme.sub-title: The Fighting Fish Strike! Across the Deadly Iron Bridge!

programme.title: Zoro tracks the thief who stole his sword - and learns about a danger facing the Straw Hats! Meanwhile, Law, Usopp, and the others arrive at Green Bit only to find it inhabited by strange creatures, and swarming with the Navy soldiers!
programme.desc: One Piece

programme.title: All but done for, Sanji is trapped by Violet and her crew when she suddenly changes her mind and mysteriously turns on her own men! Meanwhile, Robin and Usopp come face to face with the Little People known as the Tontatta Tribe.
programme.desc: One Piece
programme.sub-title: The Unknown World! The Tontatta Kingdom!

programme.title: Sanji gets in touch with Law in order to share a shocking secret - that could unsettle the Straw Hats' plans in Dressrosa for good! Meanwhile, Luffy's Block C battle begins, but will his Gum-Gum powers give him away?
programme.desc: One Piece
programme.sub-title: The Stratagem of the Century! Doflamingo Makes His Move!

programme.title: Sanji and Franky try to regroup after Doflamingo's betrayal, hoping that destroying the factory is not yet out of their grasp. Meanwhile Luffy makes a friend in the Colosseum and Usopp ends up thrust into an uncomfortable position!
programme.desc: One Piece
programme.sub-title: Shaking Heaven and Earth! Admiral Fujitora's Power!

programme.title: The Sunny is mysteriously deformed by the bizarre powers of Giolla! Can Nami, Chopper, and Brook act in time to save their beloved home? Meanwhile, the battle for Block C continues as Luffy suffers a staggering setback.
programme.desc: One Piece
programme.sub-title: A Blow of Anger! A Giant vs. Lucy!

programme.title: After knocking down the Giant, Hajrudin, as payback for what he did to Ucy, Luffy has to deal with Ideo, whose punch has the destructive force of a bomb, while the Funk Brothers show off their bizarre fighting technique.
programme.desc: One Piece
programme.sub-title: Destruction Cannon Blasts! Lucy in Trouble!

programme.title: Nami, Chopper, and Brooke keep trying to evade Jora and win back the Sunny even though it's been turned into a piece of art! In the Colosseum, Don Chin Jao finally faces Luffy - whose power will prove greater?
programme.desc: One Piece
programme.sub-title: The Legendary Pirate! Don Chin Jao!

programme.title: Luffy stands along against Don Chinjao, and learns about the old grudge he bears against Garp! Meanwhile, Usopp and Robin get swept up in the Tontatta Kingdom's raid against the royal family, and Franky learns the eerie secret of Dressrosa.
programme.desc: One Piece
programme.sub-title: Light and Shadow! Darkness behind Dressrosa!

programme.title: The Tontatta Kingdom gears up for its all-out assault on the Doflamingo Family, as Usopp and Robin are caught up in the war effort! Meanwhile, Franky arrives the headquarters of the toy movement where he finds Zoro, Nami & the others are cornered by Jora.
programme.desc: One Piece
programme.sub-title: Making a Sortie! The Legendary Hero Usoland!

programme.title: Don Chin Jao's hatred of Garp and Luffy is finally explained, while his battle against Luffy comes to an end. With tremendous power, one of them is squarely eliminated! But is that really the end of the Colosseum battle?
programme.desc: One Piece
programme.sub-title: The Fierce Battle Coming to the End! Lucy vs. Chin Jao!

programme.title: With the battle with Don Chinjao long behind him, Luffy advances to the final round! Block-D contender Cavendish, however, takes the chance and pounces on Luffy, who is defended by an unlikely ally! The agenda of Colosseum gladiator Rebecca is exposed.
programme.desc: One Piece
programme.sub-title: Luffy and the Gladiator of Fate - Rebecca!

programme.title: The Core, (2003, Science fiction)
programme.desc: The Earth has stopped rotating because of a change in the planet's core temperature. To restore the normal temperature, astronauts must travel to the center and detonate a nuclear bomb before the core superheats and destroys all life on the surface.

programme.title: Infinite, (2021, Science fiction)
programme.desc: Evan McCauley has skills he never learned and memories of places he has never visited. Self-medicated and on the brink of a mental breakdown, a secret group that call themselves Infinites come to his rescue, revealing that his memories are real.

programme.title: Source Code, (2011, Science fiction)
programme.desc: Jake Gyllenhaal stars in this action thriller about a man who awakens in another man’s body to discover only he has the ability to stop a terrorist attack on a commuter train.

programme.title: Interstellar, (2014, Science fiction)
programme.desc: From director Christopher Nolan (Inception) comes the story of ex-pilot Cooper (Matthew McConaughey), who must leave his family and Earth behind to lead an expedition beyond this galaxy to discover whether mankind has a future among the stars.

programme.title: Total Recall, (1990, Science fiction)
programme.desc: It's 2084 A.D. and Doug Quaid is haunted by recurring dreams about journeying to Earths closest planetary neighbor, Mars.

programme.title: Snowpiercer, (2014, Science fiction)
programme.desc: After a failed global-warming experiment, a post-apocalyptic Ice Age has killed off nearly all life on the planet.

programme.title: Interstellar, (2014, Science fiction)
programme.desc: From director Christopher Nolan (Inception) comes the story of ex-pilot Cooper (Matthew McConaughey), who must leave his family and Earth behind to lead an expedition beyond this galaxy to discover whether mankind has a future among the stars.

programme.title: Hour Of The Gun, (1967, Western)
programme.desc: Director John Sturges presents a reworking of the Wyatt Earp/Doc Holliday legend and the struggle for political control of Tombstone, with a marvelous trio of antagonists: James Garner as Earp, Jason Robards as Holliday, and Robert Ryan as Clanton.

programme.title: Support Your Local Sheriff!, (1969, Western)
programme.desc: James Garner stars in this rollicking western spoof that has him taking on the job of a frontier town sheriff who must fend off villains (led by Walter Brennen) from every direction...all without breaking a sweat or dirtying his shiny black boots!

programme.title: Support Your Local Gunfighter, (1971, Western)
programme.desc: James Garner is back in the saddle again as hustler Latigo Smith whose latest con is passing off cowhand Jug (Jack Elam) as the dreaded gunman Swifty Morgan. But when the real Swifty shows up, the Wild West is going to get a whole lot wackier!

programme.title: Little Big Man, (1970, Western)
programme.desc: From director Arthur Penn (BONNIE AND CLYDE), Dustin Hoffman, Chief Dan George, Faye Dunaway, Martin Balsam, Jeff Corey and Richard Mulligan star in a genre-defying tale of an alleged 121-year-old white survivor of Custer's Last Stand.

programme.title: Fort Defiance, (1951, Western)
programme.desc: A former Civil War solider bent on killing the man whose surrender got his brother killed, later finds out a rancher wants that same man and his blind brother killed.

programme.title: Rootin' Tootin' Rhythm, (1937, Western)
programme.desc: Ranch owner Gene Autry and his pal Frog Millhouse are after cattle rustlers and become mixed up in a comedy of errors when they don the clothes of two dead outlaws, only to learn that the outlaws are really dead sheriffs, dressed in outlaw's clothes!

programme.title: Public Cowboy No. 1, (1937, Western)
programme.desc: Gene Autry's crime fighting is tested when rustlers employ modern techniques. The newspaper's scathing editorials bash Gene's methods and demand to call in big city detectives. Old methods are tested.

programme.title: One-Eyed Jacks, (1961, Western)
programme.desc: After robbing a Mexican bank, Dad Longworth takes the loot and leaves his partner Rio to be captured but Rio escapes and searches for Dad in California.

programme.title: Fort Yuma, (1955, Western)
programme.desc: When a revered Apache chief is brutally murdered en route to Fort Yuma to negotiate a peace treaty, all-out war erupts in this rousing -- and surprisingly touching -- western starring Peter Graves and directed by the legendary Lesley Selander.

programme.title: Across the Universe, (2007, Musical)
programme.desc: A love story about a British boy and an American girl set against the backdrop of the social upheaval of the 1960s.

programme.title: How to Lose a Guy in 10 Days, (2003, Romance)
programme.desc: A "How to..." columnist agrees to write a first-hand account about what it takes to drive a man out of your life... in exactly 10 days.

programme.title: Catch and Release, (2007, Romantic comedy)
programme.desc: Gray Wheeler just lost everything. But it could be the best thing that ever happened to her. After the death of her fiancé, Gray moves in with her late love's best friends. While Sam and Dennis do their best to cheer Gray up. Rated: PG-13

programme.title: Sydney White, (2007, Romantic comedy)
programme.desc: A modern retelling of Snow White set against students in their freshman year of college in the greek system.

programme.title: Little Man, (2006, Comedy)
programme.desc: A wannabe dad mistakes a vertically challenged criminal on the lam as his newly adopted son.

programme.title: How to Lose a Guy in 10 Days, (2003, Romance)
programme.desc: A "How to..." columnist agrees to write a first-hand account about what it takes to drive a man out of your life... in exactly 10 days.

programme.title: Catch and Release, (2007, Romantic comedy)
programme.desc: Gray Wheeler just lost everything. But it could be the best thing that ever happened to her. After the death of her fiancé, Gray moves in with her late love's best friends. While Sam and Dennis do their best to cheer Gray up. Rated: PG-13

programme.title: Sydney White, (2007, Romantic comedy)
programme.desc: A modern retelling of Snow White set against students in their freshman year of college in the greek system.

programme.title: With Maggie back at Alexandria, Carol takes Negan on a journey to minimize the increasing tension; here, Negan reflects on his late wife, Lucille, and the events that led him to this point.
programme.desc: The Walking Dead

programme.title: Daryl leads a mission team to scavenge the military base he discovered; Maggie tells her story, prompting a new mission for survival that only Negan can lead; Eugene and his group go through assessment by the Commonwealth's paramilitary police.
programme.desc: The Walking Dead

programme.title: Maggie's mission takes the team through a subway tunnel, challenged by lurking walkers and a recalcitrant Negan; with Eugene's group, Yumiko seeks answers about her brother and demands expedited processing into the Commonwealth.

programme.title: Daryl and Dog get captured by the Reapers; they are taken to the Meridian and reconnect with a familiar figure from their past.
programme.desc: The Walking Dead

programme.desc: The Walking Dead

programme.title: Escaping from walkers, Connie and Virgil hide in a house occupied by mysterious creatures; Pope tests Daryl's loyalty to the Reapers with a conflicting mission; Kelly leaves Alexandria in search of Connie.
programme.desc: The Walking Dead

programme.title: Maggie and Elijah learn a new survival tactic from Negan; Eugene's group clears walkers to pay their fines; Yumiko interviews for an upper-class job; Daryl learns more about Leah and the Reapers; Gabriel encounters a man of God.
programme.desc: The Walking Dead

programme.title: The Reapers defend Meridian from an incoming herd; Pope suspects Maggie is behind the attack, while Daryl treads carefully; Alexandrians scramble to protect themselves when a violent storm leaves them vulnerable to walkers.

programme.title: Sailor Moon
programme.desc: Sailor Moon runs off to save Mamoru from Nehalennia. The rest of the Sailor Guardians try to go after her, but they fall victim to Nehalennia’s traps.
programme.sub-title: For Love: The Endless Battle in the Dark World

programme.title: Sailor Moon
programme.desc: Sailor Chibi Moon and Sailor Saturn make it to Nehalennia’s palace, where Mamoru is being held prisoner. The two Guardians are unable to free him.
programme.sub-title: Moon Power of Love: The Nightmare Ends

programme.title: Sailor Moon
programme.desc: Mamoru tells Usagi that he’s accepted an offer to study abroad in the U.S., which will force them to have a long-distance relationship.
programme.sub-title: Farewells and Encounters: The Transitioning Stars of Destiny

programme.title: Sailor Moon
programme.desc: Usagi runs into Seiya and is annoyed by his cocky attitude. The next day, Seiya and the rest of Three Lights have transferred to her school.
programme.sub-title: A School Storm: The Transfer Students Are Idols

programme.title: Sailor Moon
programme.desc: Minako decides to work for the Three Lights as their personal assistant. But Minako soon realizes that being a star is not all fun and glamor.

programme.title: Sailor Moon
programme.desc: The Three Lights are rehearsing for their upcoming musical. But they seem to have a hard time winning the approval of the stage director.
programme.sub-title: Fighter's Secret Identity: The Shocking Super Transformation

programme.title: Sailor Moon
programme.desc: Ami invites Taiki to come and watch the Wataru’s Comet pass by Earth with their science teacher Amanogawa, only to be rejected.
programme.sub-title: A Star of Dreams and Wishes: Taiki's Transformation

programme.title: Sailor Moon
programme.desc: Usagi and the girls are searching for Luna, who has gone missing. To their surprise, they find Luna being introduced on TV as Yaten’s pet cat.
programme.sub-title: Luna's Discovery: The Real Face of Yaten

programme.title: Sailor Moon
programme.desc: Taiki asks Makoto to appear on a cooking show with him. Usagi decides to tag along, but her clumsiness creates a huge mess at the TV studio.
programme.sub-title: Friend or Foe? Star Lights and the Sailor Guardians

programme.title: Sailor Moon
programme.desc: Usagi and the girls try to buy tickets to a Three Lights concert. Michiru gives them the tickets, revealing that she will be preforming.
programme.sub-title: Calling of the Shining Stars: Enter Haruka and Michiru

programme.title: Sailor Moon
programme.desc: Seiya asks Usagi out on a date, to which she agrees. Sailor Iron Mouse attempts to make up for her recent failures by going after Seiya’s star seed.

programme.title: Sailor Moon
programme.desc: Usagi and Luna encounter a girl who appears to be lost. The two are surprised to find the same girl now living in Usagi’s house as her younger sister.
programme.sub-title: Invaders from Outer Space: The Coming of Siren

programme.title: Sailor Moon
programme.desc: Over the summer, the girls go camping in the mountains, where they run into the Three Lights, who are there shooting for an upcoming film.
programme.sub-title: The Screaming Dead: Terror of the Camp Monster

programme.title: Sailor Moon
programme.desc: Usagi ends up agreeing to let Seiya spend the night at her place. Worried about leaving two teenagers together, the rest of the girls decide to join.
programme.sub-title: A Night Alone Together: Usagi in Danger

programme.title: Sailor Moon
programme.desc: Taiki begins to question if their activity as Three Lights is really helping with their goal of finding their missing princess.
programme.sub-title: Taiki's Song Filled with Passion and Faith

programme.title: Sailor Moon
programme.desc: Chibi-Chibi has been coming home with lots of snacks. Curious where she’s getting the snacks from, Usagi and the girls decide to follow Chibi-Chibi.
programme.sub-title: Chibi-Chibi's Mystery: The Big Noisy Chase

programme.title: Sailor Moon
programme.desc: Usagi teamed up with Seiya for the school softball tournament. Usagi becomes a target of Seiya’s jealous fans, who think she is hitting on him.
programme.sub-title: The Shining Power of a Star: Chibi-Chibi's Transformation

programme.title: Sailor Moon
programme.desc: Sailor Aluminum Siren learns that Usagi is Sailor Moon. She sets a trap on a plane in order to get Usagi’s attention.
programme.sub-title: Invitation to Terror: Usagi's Night Flight

programme.title: Sailor Moon
programme.desc: A rift is created between the Sailor Guardians and the Star Lights after they discover each other’s secret identities.
programme.sub-title: Duty or Friendship: Conflict Between the Sailor Guardians

programme.title: Sailor Moon
programme.desc: Uranus and the other Outer Guardians warn the Star Lights to never see Sailor Moon again. Usagi is worried about Seiya after he gets injured.
programme.sub-title: Truth Revealed: The Star Lights' Past

programme.title: Sailor Moon
programme.desc: Ami and the others try to clear up the misunderstanding the Three Lights have about Usagi.
programme.sub-title: Butterflies of Light: A New Chapter on the Horizon

programme.title: Sailor Moon
programme.desc: Minako is close to realizing her lifelong dream of becoming an idol after making it to the final round of auditions in a talent-search contest.
programme.sub-title: Go for Your Dream: Minako Becomes an Idol

programme.title: Sailor Moon
programme.desc: Sailor Lead Crow finds a note left behind by her deceased friend Sailor Aluminum Siren that contains information on Sailor Moon’s true identity.
programme.sub-title: The Stolen Silver Crystal: Princess Kakyu Appears

programme.title: Sailor Moon
programme.desc: Princess Kakyu appears before the Sailor Guardians. Princess Kakyu explains that she has come to Earth in search of the Light of Hope.
programme.sub-title: Crusade for the Galaxy: Legend of the Sailor Wars

programme.title: Sailor Moon
programme.desc: Usagi finally confesses to Rei that she’s been unable to get in touch with Mamoru. The Three Lights publicly announce their intention to disband.
programme.sub-title: Princess Kakyu Perishes: Advent of Galaxia

programme.title: Sailor Moon
programme.desc: Princess Kakyu perishes after being defeated by Galaxia. The Sailor Star Lights go after Galaxia to avenge their fallen princess.
programme.sub-title: Countdown to Destruction: The Sailor Guardians' Last Battle

programme.title: Sailor Moon
programme.desc: Sailor Mars, Mercury, Jupiter and Venus lose their star seeds after shielding Sailor Moon and the Star Lights from Galaxia’s attack.
programme.sub-title: Ruler of the Galaxy: The Menace of Galaxia

programme.title: Sailor Moon
programme.desc: Uranus and Neptune have turned against the Sailor Guardians by swearing allegiance to Galaxia.
programme.sub-title: Dying Stars: Uranus and Neptune's Last Stand

programme.title: Sailor Moon
programme.desc: Galaxia is revealed to be the Legendary Sailor Guardian who sealed away Chaos. She has become corrupt and has gone on to conquer the galaxy herself.
programme.sub-title: The Light of Hope: The Final Battle for the Galaxy

programme.title: Sailor Moon

programme.title: Caçado, (2003)
programme.desc: 2003. Aaron Hallam é um perigoso assassino, que mata suas vítimas de um modo peculiar: ele perseguia caçadores de cervos como se fosse um esporte, em uma floresta de Portland. Gêneros: Action & Adventure Elenco: Tommy Lee Jones, Connie Nielsen, Benicio Del Toro, Leslie Stefanson, John Finn, José Zúñiga, Ron Canada, Mark Pellegrino, Jenna Boyd, Aaron DeCone Diretor: William Friedkin

programme.title: B13-U 13º Distrito - Ultimato, (2004)
programme.desc: 2004. Damien e Leito estão retornando ao Distrito 13 em uma missão para levar a paz ao setor controlado por cinco líderes de gangues diferentes, antes que os serviços secretos da cidade tomem medidas drásticas para resolver o problema. Gêneros: Action & Adventure Elenco: Cyril Raffaelli, David Belle, Philippe Torreton Diretor: Patrick Alessandrin

programme.title: Dose dupla, (2013)
programme.desc: 2013. Dois agentes especiais precisam se unir contra um cartel de drogas mexicano depois que uma operação secreta acaba gerando resultados catastróficos. Gêneros: Action & Adventure Elenco: Denzel Washington, Mark Wahlberg, Paula Patton Diretor: Baltasar Kormákur

programme.title: Ruslan-Vingança Explosiva, (2009)
programme.desc: 2009. Ruslan Drachev é um ex-gangster que agora escreve romances criminais baseados em suas experiências. Ao visitar sua família ele descobre que sua filha está casando com o filho de um arqui-inimigo do mundo do crime. Gêneros: Action & Adventure Elenco: Steven Seagal Diretor: Jeff King

programme.title: Ninja, (2010)
programme.desc: 2010. Casey é um garoto apaixonado pela filosofia ninja, ele o leva ao Japão para estudar Ninjutsu. Sua instrução progride e seu sensei o envia para Nova York para proteger o lendário Yoroi Bitsu, um baú blindado contendo as armas do último Ninja Koga. Gêneros: Action & Adventure Elenco: Scott Adkins – Tsuyoshi Ihara, Miki Hijii Diretor: Isaac Florentine

programme.title: Risco Absoluto, (2010)
programme.desc: 2010. Liberado após seis anos preso por um crime que não cometeu, Shane Danielsnão demora a se meter novamente em encrenca. Ele testemunha um crime e para salvar uma jovem sequestrada se envolve com a máfia chinesa, russos e policiais corruptos. Gêneros: Action & Adventure Elenco: Steven Seagal Diretor: Keoni Waxman

programme.title: O Guardião, (2010)
programme.desc: 2010. Um policial de Los Angeles voa para o Novo México para trabalhar como guarda-costas para a filha de um poderoso empresário. Quando gangsters a sequestram, ele os procura para resgatá-la e protegê-la. Gêneros: Action & Adventure Elenco: Steven Seagal Diretor: Keoni Waxman

programme.title: Código de Honra, (2016)
programme.desc: 2016. Um ex-coronel das forças especiais se torna um vigilante que mata criminosos, enquanto um ex-colega quer detê-lo. Gêneros: Action & Adventure Elenco: Steven Seagal, James Russo, Louis Mandylor, Craig Sheffer, Griff Furst, Helena Mattsson, Rafael Petardi, R.D. Call, Michael Flynn, Ileana Huxley Diretor: Michael Winnick

programme.title: Beowulf: O Guerreiro das Sombras, (1999)
programme.desc: 1999. Numa terra sob cerco, Beowulf deve combater a horrível criatura Grendel e a sua mãe que procura vingança. Gêneros: Action & Adventure Elenco: Christopher Lambert, Rhona Mitra, Oliver Cotton, Götz Otto, Vincent Hammond, Charles Robinson, Brent Jefferson Lowe, Roger Sloman, Layla Roberts, Patr... Diretor: Graham Baker

programme.title: Instinto Selvagem 2, (2006)
programme.desc: 2006. A romancista Catherine está novamente em apuros com a lei e a Scotland Yard nomeia o psiquiatra Dr. Michael Glass para avaliá-la. No entanto, como o detetive Nick Curran antes dele, Glass fica fascinado por Tramell e é atraído para um jogo sedutor. Gêneros: Drama Elenco: Sharon Stone, David Morrissey, Charlotte Rampling, David Thewlis, Stan Collymore, Indira Varma, Heathcote Williams, Hugh Dancy, Terence Harvey, Jan Ch... Diretor: Michael Caton-Jones

programme.title: Perigo na Montanha, (2018)
programme.desc: 2018. Joe Braven é um lenhador humilde que vive na fronteira dos Estados Unidos. Quando ele é assaltado por um grupo de traficantes de drogas na cabana isolada onde ele mora, ele fará tudo o que puder para proteger sua família. Gêneros: Thriller Elenco: Jason Momoa, Garret Dillahunt, Jill Wagner, Glenn Ennis, Todd Scott, Stephen Lang, Sasha Rossof, Sala Baker, Fraser Aitcheson, Teach Grant Diretor: Lin Oeding

programme.title: Redenção, (2013)
programme.desc: 2013. Jason Statham é um veterano de guerra que assume uma nova identidade enquanto tenta se vingar dos assassinos de sua namorada grávida. Gêneros: Action & Adventure Elenco: Agata Buzek, Jason Statham Diretor: Steven Knight

programme.title: Centurião, (2010)
programme.desc: 2010. O Império Romano controla do Egito à Espanha, do leste até o Mar Negro. Entretanto ele enfrenta problemas no norte da Grã-Bretanha, devido às táticas de guerrilha usadas por seus inimigos. Gêneros: Action & Adventure Elenco: Andreas Wisniewski, Axelle Carolyn, Dave Legeno, David Morrissey, Dhaffer L Abidine, Dominic West, Jj Feild, Lee Ross. Diretor: Neil Marshall

programme.title: Soldado Universal 3: Regeneração, (2009)
programme.desc: 2009. Um soldado ressuscitado e geneticamente modificado enfrenta seus inimigos, contratados por terroristas nucleares. Gêneros: Sci-Fi & Fantasy Elenco: Van Damme, Dolph Ludgren Diretor: John Hyams

programme.title: Refém, (2005)
programme.desc: 2005. Um negociador precisa salvar uma família enquanto luta para proteger seus próprios entes queridos. Gêneros: Action & Adventure Elenco: Bruce Willis, Ben Foster, Jonathan Tucker, Jimmy Bennett, Michelle Horn, Marshall Allman, Kevin Pollak, Rumer Willis, Robert Knepper, Kim Coates Diretor: Florent-Emilio Siri

programme.title: Blitz, (2020)
programme.desc: 2020. Blitz é um serial killer de Londres que está matando policiais. O inspetor-chefe Roberts e o sargento Brant, um detetive de polícia duro, inflexível e politicamente incorreto, terão a tarefa de tentar deter o psicopata. Gêneros: Action & Adventure Elenco: Jason Statham, Paddy Considine, Aidan Gillen, David Riley Diretor: Elliott Lester, Jordan Hill

programme.title: Fogo contra Fogo, (2020)
programme.desc: 2020. Um bombeiro fora de serviço testemunha um assassinato nas mãos de uma gangue de gangsters. Ele entra no programa de proteção a testemunhas até depor, mas não pode se esconder por muito tempo da gangue, então decide agir por conta própria. Gêneros: Action & Adventure Elenco: Josh Duhamel, Bruce Willis, Rosario Dawson Diretor: David Barrett

programme.title: Irmandade, (2011)
programme.desc: 2011. Kane e sua equipe decidiram acabar com a Yakuza de uma vez por todas. Gêneros: Action & Adventure Elenco: Steven Seagal, Sarah Lind Diretor: Keoni Waxman

programme.title: Alvo Duplo, (2012)
programme.desc: 2012. Dois caras durões e pertencentes a lados opostos da lei vão unir forças para dar um ponto final em uma onda de assassinatos brutais, mas a tarefa não será nada fácil e muito sangue vai rolar. Gêneros: Crime Elenco: Christian, Slater, Stallone, Sylvester Diretor: Walter Hill

programme.title: Carga Explosiva 3, (2008)

programme.desc: 1970. Um grupo de turistas jovens viaja para as montanhas e encontra a mítica paragem de Donner Pass, onde pioneiros do século 19 ficaram presos na neve e recorreram ao canibalismo para sobreviver. Infelizmente, o horror também sobreviveu. Gêneros: Action & Adventure

programme.desc: 1970. Ruslan, um artista sonha em se tornar um cavaleiro, se apaixona por Mila. A felicidade deles não dura muito tempo. Chernomor, o malvado feiticeiro, rouba Mila diante dos olhos de Ruslan para transformar seu poder de amor em seu próprio poder mágico. Gêneros: Action & Adventure

programme.title: Max Steel, (1970)
programme.desc: 1970. Max é um adolescente de 16 anos que está passando por um período de descobertas. Entretanto, as transformações na vida do jovem estão relacionadas aos incríveis poderes que ele descobre ter quando entra em contato com uma força extraterrestre. Gêneros: Action & Adventure

programme.title: Três Ladrões e um Bebê, (1970)
programme.desc: 1970. O compulsivo jogador Slipper vê o sequestro do neto de um magnata a salvação de suas dívidas. Quando, junto com seu senhorio e o oportunista Octopus, sequestra BB, sem saber, frustram os planos do crime organizado, que também está atrás da criança. Gêneros: Action & Adventure

programme.title: Nezha - Correndo pela Vida, (1970)
programme.desc: 1970. A equipe Lions de Fórmula 1 perde seu o principal piloto e coloca em seu lugar o campeão do simulador de corrida Du Jieke. Com um oponente forte e conflitos a resolver, a equipe enfrenta uma batalha feroz. Gêneros: Action & Adventure

programme.title: Uma Viagem para a Espanha, (1970)
programme.desc: 1970. Steve Coogan e Rob Brydon conhecem restaurantes e hotéis da costa espanhola, trocando piadas e impressões sobre seus almoços, conversando sobre paternidade, masculinidade e envelhecimento. Gêneros: Action & Adventure

programme.title: Retroceder Nunca, Render-se Jamais, (1970)

programme.title: A Última Jornada, (1970)

Gêneros: Action & Adventure Elenco: Tygo Gernandt, Egbert Jan Weeber, Samuel Reurekas, Sarah Janneh... Diretor: Pim van Hoeve

programme.title: Thor: Deus do Trovão, (2022)
programme.desc: 2022. O inescrupuloso Loki escapou de Asgard e está à procura de Yggdrasil, a árvore que contém toda a força do universo. Ele planeja destruí-la e replantá-la à sua imagem e semelhança. Gêneros: Action & Adventure Elenco: Ashford J. Thomas, Daniel O'Reilly, Myrom Kingery, Neli Sabour, Robert Christopher Smith, Tyler Christopher, Vaune Suitt, Vernon Wells, Eva Ceja, Vadim Brunell Diretor: Noah Luke

programme.title: Adventure Boyz, (2019)
programme.desc: 2019. Quando o maior castelo da Inglaterra é roubado por um notório chefe do crime, a última coisa que ele e sua gangue esperam é ter que enfrentar Sam e Jake, dois garotos em suas bicicletas. Gêneros: Action & Adventure Elenco: Angela Dixon, Glenn Salvage, Howard J. Ford, Jon Campling, Jonathan Hansler, Richard Banks, Russell Shaw Diretor: Howard J. Ford

programme.title: Fanfan La Tulipe, (2003)
programme.desc: 2003. O habilidoso espadachim e mulherengo Fanfan La Tulipe é obrigado a se juntar ao exército do rei Luís XV pela trambiqueira Adeline La Franchise , que o convence dizendo que assim se casará com uma das filhas do rei. Gêneros: Action & Adventure Elenco: Vincent Perez, Penélope Cruz, Didier Bourdon Diretor: Gérard Krawczyk

programme.title: Império Proibido, (2015)
programme.desc: 2015. No início do século 18, o cartógrafo Jonathan Green empreende uma viagem científica da Europa para o Oriente. Passando pela Transilvânia e cruzando as montanhas dos Cárpatos, ele encontra uma pequena vila perdida na floresta. Gêneros: Action & Adventure Elenco: Jason Flemyng, Aleksey Chadov, Agniya Ditkovskite Diretor: Oleg Stepchenko

programme.title: Carol, (1970)
programme.desc: 1970. Therese Belivet tem um emprego entediante em uma loja de departamentos. Um dia, ela conhece Carol, uma elegante e misteriosa cliente. Rapidamente, as duas mulheres desenvolvem um vínculo amoroso que terá consequências sérias. Gêneros: Entertainment

programme.title: Amor, Felicidade ou Casamento, (1970)
programme.desc: 1970. Uma terapeuta de casais descobre que seus pais estão se divorciando e tenta salvar o casamento deles. Ao se dar conta de que seus esforços não estão adiantando, ela começa a questionar o próprio casamento e sua profissão. Gêneros: Entertainment

programme.title: Arriscando a Sorte, (1970)
programme.desc: 1970. Depois de viver por anos em Nova York com documentos falsos, Camilo Sanz recebe um aviso de deportação. Desesperado, ele pega dinheiro emprestado com um perigoso agiota do bairro para fazer um casamento falso com uma conhecida e evitar ser deportado. Gêneros: Entertainment

programme.title: Double Dragon, (1970)
programme.desc: 1970. Kami, o mestre do Komodo Dojo, recruta um Dragão Júnior chamado Michael e o usa para atacar o Shadow Dojo e se vingar do Shadow Master. No entanto, quando Michael é capturado, Kami precisa deixar de lado seu desejo de vingança. Gêneros: Entertainment

programme.desc: 1970. A história de seis mulheres que vivem em um país onde muitas pessoas lutam para se converter naquilo que todos os homens desejam: a mulher perfeita. Gêneros: Entertainment

programme.title: Sozinho com o Inimigo, (1970)
programme.desc: 1970. Após a morte inesperada do avô, Henry, um menino de 12 anos, se vê isolado em uma fazenda. Sem ninguém para protegê-lo, o garoto se torna alvo de um psicopata. Gêneros: Entertainment

programme.title: Cidade Armada, (1970)
programme.desc: 1970. Após a morte violenta de seu pai, um adolescente e sua mãe se mudam para uma cidade pequena do interior. Will faz novos amigos e é apresentado à cultura local de armas, fraturando ainda mais seu relacionamento com sua mãe e complicando sua dor. Gêneros: Entertainment

programme.title: Federal, (1970)
programme.desc: 1970. O Delegado Vital e o agente Dani estão à frente de uma operação do Comando de Operações Táticas da Polícia Federal do Brasil para capturar o playboy brasiliense Carlos Beque, envolvido com o tráfico internacional de cocaína. Gêneros: Entertainment

programme.title: Instinto Materno, (1970)
programme.desc: 1970. Após trauma, uma mãe solteira se muda com a filha para uma isolada fazenda no interior. Mas logo coisas sinistras voltam a acontecer e seus instintos maternos são colocados à prova novamente. Gêneros: Entertainment

programme.title: Caçador de Demônios, (1970)
programme.desc: 1970. O caçador de demônios Jebediah Woodley viaja até uma pequena cidade ao sul do Mississippi na expectativa de enfrentar um demônio. Quando a entidade maligna é acidentalmente libertada, ela começa a possuir e matar os moradores da região. Gêneros: Entertainment

programme.title: O Inimaginável, (1970)
programme.desc: 1970. Em um futuro apocalíptico, a Suécia enfrenta um misterioso ataque, e Alex se vê obrigado a voltar para sua terra natal. Ali, ele deve lidar com seu pai e também reencontrar seu amor de juventude, Anna. Gêneros: Entertainment

programme.title: Rastros do Além, (1970)
programme.desc: 1970. Depois de um evento cataclísmico o mundo passa a viver uma nova realidade onde os vivos e os mortos coexistem. Após nove anos de convivência pacífica, uma jovem é ameaçada e se arrisca para descobrir o por quê desta mudança repentina. Gêneros: Entertainment

programme.title: O Falsificador, (1970)
programme.desc: 1970. Ray Cutter sai da prisão, mas precisa reproduzir um valioso quadro e roubar o original para não ser preso novamente. Enquanto está fora das grades, Ray tenta se reconectar com seu filho e pede a ajuda de seu velho pai neste novo objetivo. Gêneros: Drama

programme.title: À Espera da Chuva, (1970)
programme.desc: 1970. Após a morte misteriosa de seu pai, uma jornalista volta à sua cidade natal no interior. Ao chegar, descobre que o local está devastado pela seca e se tornou um lugar atormentado por gangues e os maus efeitos da pobreza extrema. Gêneros: Drama

programme.title: Filha de Deus, (1970)
programme.desc: 1970. O detetive Scott Galban busca a verdade sobre a misteriosa morte de seu parceiro. Enquanto isso, Isabel de la Cruz, uma mulher local que diz ter sido testemunha de um milagre, começa a vivenciar estranhos acontecimentos. Gêneros: Drama

programme.title: Meu Nome É Sara, (1970)
programme.desc: 1970. Sara Góralnik, uma polonesa judia cuja família foi morta pelos nazistas, foge para a Ucrânia usando a identidade roubada de uma amiga. Ela é acolhida por um casal de fazendeiros, mas lá descobre que seus novos amigos possuem segredos sombrios. Gêneros: Drama

programme.title: Sem Rastros, (1970)
programme.desc: 1970. Depois que uma menina desaparece de um parque de trailers, o pai e a mãe da garota decidem fazer justiça com as próprias mãos. A busca desesperada dos pais pela verdade acaba levando a uma revelação chocante. Gêneros: Drama

programme.title: Enquanto Houver Esperança, (1970)
programme.desc: 1970. Angélica é uma adolescente de 16 anos que luta contra uma forma rara de câncer. E, enquanto seus pais batalham para custear seu tratamento e ganhar mais tempo de vida para a garota, ela se apaixona pela primeira vez. Gêneros: Drama

programme.title: A História de Wim de A a Z, (1970)
programme.desc: 1970. Conheça a história do órfão Wim, um menino que quer muito ir à escola em vez de passar o tempo todo trabalhando forçadamente na fábrica da cidade. Com muita força de vontade, Wim consegue escapar e encontrar novos amigos. Gêneros: Drama

programme.title: Alex Rider Contra o Tempo, (1970)
programme.desc: 1970. Alex Rider, adolescente britânico habilidoso em linguística, mergulho, artes marciais e tiro, é recrutado pelo MI6. Sua primeira missão é investigar o bilionário Darrius Sayle, que fez suspeitas doações de mega computadores às escolas da Inglaterra. Gêneros: Drama

programme.title: A Eterna Namorada, (1970)
programme.desc: 1970. Big Stone Gap é o lar de personagens charmosos e excêntricos. Ave Maria Mulligan, uma farmacêutica de 35 anos, é a solteirona da cidade. A vida de Ave vira de cabeça para baixo depois que ela descobre um segredo de família. Gêneros: Drama

programme.title: Deus Não Está Morto - Uma Luz na Escuridão, (1970)
programme.desc: 1970. Um incêndio atinge a Igreja de Saint James, devastando a congregação e o Pastor Dave, e a universidade vizinha usa a tragédia para tentar despejar a congregação de seu campus. Dave recorre a seu irmão, um advogado ateu, para tentar reerguer a igreja. Gêneros: Drama

programme.title: Roubo a Máfia, (1970)
programme.desc: 1970. Tommy e Rosie são um casal apaixonado, mas que acabam presos ao serem flagrados roubando. Após esse deslize, eles tentam ganhar a vida honestamente, mas logo ele se vê envolvido no julgamento de um famoso assassino da máfia. Gêneros: Drama

programme.title: Um Homem Comum, (1970)
programme.desc: 1970. Um criminoso de guerra procurado mundo afora conhece uma empregada e um estranho relacionamento surge entre eles. Quando a calmaria parece estabelecida na vida dele, ela descobre que há uma recompensa milionária para quem souber onde o fugitivo está. Gêneros: Drama

programme.title: A Hora do Acerto, (1970)
programme.desc: 1970. O inspetor de polícia Wing e todo o seu time de policiais se tornam vítimas de uma gangue. Os policiais são brutalmente assassinados e um jovem é designado para ajudá-lo, mas a gangue volta a agir, iniciando uma aventura cheia de ação e vingança. Gêneros: Drama

programme.title: 2002. Um caso de abusos sexuais envolvendo sacerdotes é o mais novo escândalo para os habitantes de South Park. programme.title: 2002. programme.title: 2020. Na terceira prova os combates são um contra um. O primeiro é entre Sasuke e Yoroi, o capanga de Orochimaru. Yoroi encurrala Sasuke, que não consegue usar seu Sharingan por causa da Marca da Maldição no pescoço. Yoroi absorve o chakra para fora de Sasuke. Gêneros: Anime

programme.desc: Naruto: O Ciúme Do Sobrancelhudo, A Rajada De Leões Se Solta! - T01E39

programme.title: 2020. Kakashi desfaz o feitiço de Sasuke, e Orochimaru aparece. Ele quer o poder de Sharingan que o clã Uchiha possui. Nas preliminares da terceira prova, Zaku da Aldeia Escondida do Som luta contra Shino da Aldeia Oculta da Folha. Gêneros: Anime

programme.desc: Naruto: Kakashi E Orochimaru Cara A Cara - T01E40

programme.desc: Naruto: Explosão Kunoichi: As Rivais Se Enfrentam - T01E41

programme.desc: Naruto: A Batalha Final: Cha! - T01E42

programme.desc: Naruto: Uma Derrota Digna - T01E47

programme.title: 2020. Para curar seus braços, Orochimaru oferece trazer de volta à vida o irmão mais novo de Tsunade e Dan, o amor dela. Gêneros: Anime
programme.desc: Naruto: Imperdoável!Uma Total Falta De Respeito! - T01E90

programme.title: 2020. Naruto fica furioso pelo jeito que Tsunade desrespeita a posição do Hokage e a desafia a uma luta. Gêneros: Anime
programme.desc: Naruto: Herança!O Colar Da Morte! - T01E91

programme.title: Bleach - O Filme: The Diamond Dust Rebellion
programme.desc: 2009. Após o artefato Ouin ser roubado, Toshiro Hitsugaya desaparece e passa a ser suspeito de traição. Gêneros: Anime Elenco: Fabio Lucindo, Alex Minei, Tati Kelpmair, Henrique Reis, Luiza Porto, Wallace Raj, Elcio Sodré Diretor: Noriyuki Abe

programme.title: Bleach - O Filme: Fade to Black
programme.desc: 2008. Ichigo trava uma batalha para salvar a Rukia antes que eles sejam forçados a se separar para sempre! Gêneros: Anime Elenco: Fabio Lucindo, Tati Kelpmair, Henrique Reis, Luiza Porto, Wallace Raj, Elcio Sodré Diretor: Noriyuki Abe

programme.title: Bleach - O Filme: Hell Verse
programme.desc: 2010. Ichigo precisará viajar para as profundezas do Inferno para salvar a sua irmã mais nova, Yuzu. Gêneros: Anime Elenco: Fabio Lucindo, Tati Kelpmair, Henrique Reis, Luiza Porto, Wallace Raj, Elcio Sodré Diretor: Noriyuki Abe

programme.title: Street Fighter V - Victory - T01E11
programme.desc: 1995. Ao viajarem pelo rio Ganges, Ryu e Ken encontram o místico Dhalsim, que se recusa a ensinar a arte do Ki. Gêneros: Anime Elenco: Chisa Yokoyama, Kenji Haga, Kenji Utsumi, Kōji Tsujitani, Ryōichi Tanaka, Tesshō Genda Diretor: Gisaburo Sugii

programme.title: Street Fighter V - Victory - T01E12
programme.desc: 1995. Depois de serem instruídos por Dhalsim a se dirigir ao templo proibido, Ryu e Ken encontram duas estátuas aparentemente indestrutíveis. Gêneros: Anime Elenco: Kōji Tsujitani, Kenji Haga, Chisa Yokoyama, Tesshō Genda, Kenji Utsumi, Ryōichi Tanaka Diretor: Gisaburo Sugii

programme.title: Death Note - T01E35
programme.desc: 2008. Light dá a Kiyomi a ordem para matar Near. Gêneros: Anime Elenco: Alexandre Drumond, Ana Lucia, Charles Manuel, Jorge Vasconcellos, José Leonardo, Sergio Cantu Diretor: Tetsuro Araki

programme.title: Death Note - T01E36
programme.desc: 2008. De acordo com o acerto, Near e o SPK se encontram com Light e o corpo especial em um armazém. Gêneros: Anime Elenco: Alexandre Drumond, Ana Lucia, Charles Manuel, Jorge Vasconcellos, José Leonardo, Sergio Cantu Diretor: Tetsuro Araki

programme.title: Boruto: Naruto Next Generations - T01E182
programme.desc: 2021. A Equipe 7 recebe uma missão para escoltar Katasuke e transportar uma Ferramenta Científica Ninja. Preso em uma missão que não queria, Boruto encontra Ao abordo do Trem Trovão. Gêneros: Anime Elenco: Vagner Fagundes, Diego Lima, Robson Kumode, Diego Marques, Úrsula Bezerra, Lucas Gama, Luiza Porto, Mariana Zink Diretor: Hiroyuki Yamashita

programme.title: Boruto: Naruto Next Generations - T01E01
programme.desc: 2017. Boruto Uzumaki, filho do líder da aldeia, salva um garoto chamado Denki Kaminarimon, que está sendo incomodado por valentões. Gêneros: Anime Elenco: Vagner Fagundes, Diego Lima, Robson Kumode, Diego Marques, Úrsula Bezerra, Lucas Gama, Luiza Porto, Mariana Zink Diretor: Hiroyuki Yamashita

programme.title: Boruto: Naruto Next Generations - T01E02
programme.desc: 2017. Depois de ser suspenso pela bagunça na cerimônia de entrada, Boruto vai para a academia pela primeira vez. Gêneros: Anime Elenco: Vagner Fagundes, Diego Lima, Robson Kumode, Diego Marques, Úrsula Bezerra, Lucas Gama, Luiza Porto, Mariana Zink Diretor: Hiroyuki Yamashita

programme.title: Naruto Shippuden: Ressonância - T02E70
programme.desc: 2008. Quando a terceira cauda aparece, Naruto só consegue ver Orochimaru. Ele está cego até para seus companheiros de equipe. Sakura é atingida e cai inconsciente. Sai finalmente segue para sua missão secreta. Naruto libera a quarta cauda proibida. Gêneros: Anime Elenco: Ursula Bezerra, Tati Keplmair, Robson Kumode, Marcus Pejon, Yuri Chesman, Vagner Fagundes, Flavia Narciso, Thiago Keplmair, Elcio Sodre Diretor: Hayato Date

programme.title: Naruto Shippuden: Meu Amigo - T02E71
programme.desc: 2008. Naruto perde a consciência e é tomado por impulsos destrutivos. Os clones de Sai e Yamato testemunham uma batalha horrível entre Orochimaru e Naruto. O poder e a aparência de Naruto se tornam demoníacos, como se ele estivesse se transformando na Raposa. Gêneros: Anime Elenco: Ursula Bezerra, Tati Keplmair, Robson Kumode, Marcus Pejon, Yuri Chesman, Vagner Fagundes, Flavia Narciso, Thiago Keplmair, Elcio Sodre Diretor: Hayato Date

programme.title: Naruto Shippuden: Uma Ameaça Se Aproxima - T02E72
programme.desc: 2008. Naruto, mesmo transformado, não desiste de trazer Sasuke para casa. Sakura é ferida por Naruto, mas consegue usar seu ninjutsu para conter a agitação da Raposa de Nove Caudas. Orochimaru tenta deixar o campo de batalha, mas é confrontado por Sai. Gêneros: Anime Elenco: Ursula Bezerra, Tati Keplmair, Robson Kumode, Marcus Pejon, Yuri Chesman, Vagner Fagundes, Flavia Narciso, Thiago Keplmair, Elcio Sodre Diretor: Hayato Date

programme.title: Naruto: Reunião : O Tempo Restante - T01E182
programme.desc: 2020. O corpo de Natsuhi é afetado pelos efeitos da estrela. Ela controla a estrela e confronta Akahoshi desesperadamente, mas Sumaru é levado como refém. Gêneros: Anime

programme.title: Naruto: A Estrela Radiante - T01E183
programme.desc: 2020. Sumaru sente a morte da mãe e foge furioso. Naruto é incapaz de pará-lo. Para salvar Sumaru, Hokuto e Mizura arriscam suas vidas para revelar a verdade por trás do treinamento com a estrela. Gêneros: Anime

programme.title: Naruto: O Longo Dia De Kiba - T01E184
programme.desc: 2020. Akamaru é ferido por um shinobi rival de outra nação. O shinobi usou uma habilidade de luta que espalha bactéria pelo corpo do oponente, infectando as capacidades mentais da vítima. Isso faz com que Akamura entre numa fúria incontrolável. Gêneros: Anime

programme.title: Hunter x Hunter - T01E35
programme.desc: 2012. A cortina sobe para a batalha entre Gon e Hisoka. Gêneros: Anime Elenco: Pedro Volpato, Gabriel Martins, Wallace Raj, Vitor Mello, Dlaigelles Silva Diretor: Hiroshi Koujina

programme.title: Hunter x Hunter - T01E36
programme.sub-title: Uma Dívida Grande x e x um Chute de Leve
programme.desc: 2012. Gon acerta um bom soco em Hisoka e devolve o número dele. Gêneros: Anime Elenco: Pedro Volpato, Gabriel Martins, Wallace Raj, Vitor Mello, Dlaigelles Silva Diretor: Hiroshi Koujina

programme.title: JoJo's Bizarre Adventure - T02E09
