programme.title: 2007. Light usa o Death Note para tentar se livrar de uma mulher que poderia ter levado para a prisão. Gêneros: Anime Elenco: Alexandre Drumond, Ana Lucia, Charles Manuel, Jorge Vasconcellos, José Leonardo, Sergio Cantu Diretor: Tetsuro Araki
programme.desc: Death Note - T01E07

programme.title: 2007. L coloca microfones e câmeras nas casas dos membros do grupo especial, incluindo a casa de Yagami, mas Light dá um passo a frente. Gêneros: Anime Elenco: Alexandre Drumond, Ana Lucia, Charles Manuel, Jorge Vasconcellos, José Leonardo, Sergio Cantu Diretor: Tetsuro Araki
programme.desc: Death Note - T01E08

programme.title: 2007. Os assassinatos continuam, e L começa a suspeitar do comportamento perfeito de Light que então decide investigar por conta própria. Gêneros: Anime Elenco: Alexandre Drumond, Ana Lucia, Charles Manuel, Jorge Vasconcellos, José Leonardo, Sergio Cantu Diretor: Tetsuro Araki
programme.desc: Death Note - T01E09

programme.title: 2007. As suspeitas de L estão cada vez maior, e Light o convence a convidá-lo para a investigação. Gêneros: Anime Elenco: Alexandre Drumond, Ana Lucia, Charles Manuel, Jorge Vasconcellos, José Leonardo, Sergio Cantu Diretor: Tetsuro Araki
programme.desc: Death Note - T01E10

programme.title: 2007. Como previsto nas fitas enviadas a TV Sakura, apresentadores e comentaristas de notícias expressaram suas dúvidas sobre a morte de Kira. Gêneros: Anime Elenco: Alexandre Drumond, Ana Lucia, Charles Manuel, Jorge Vasconcellos, José Leonardo, Sergio Cantu Diretor: Tetsuro Araki
programme.desc: Death Note - T01E11

programme.title: 2008. Com um segundo Kira solto, L pede Light para se unir ao grupo especial para descobrir o paradeiro do verdadeiro Kira. Gêneros: Anime Elenco: Alexandre Drumond, Ana Lucia, Charles Manuel, Jorge Vasconcellos, José Leonardo, Sergio Cantu Diretor: Tetsuro Araki
programme.desc: Death Note - T01E12

programme.title: 2008. Light viaja a Aoyama para descobrir a identidade do segundo Kira antes que L suspeite mais ainda. Gêneros: Anime Elenco: Alexandre Drumond, Ana Lucia, Charles Manuel, Jorge Vasconcellos, José Leonardo, Sergio Cantu Diretor: Tetsuro Araki
programme.desc: Death Note - T01E13

programme.title: 2008. Light e Misa mostram seus Death Notes, então Light pede que Misa use sua Rem Shinigami para se livrar de L. Gêneros: Anime Elenco: Alexandre Drumond, Ana Lucia, Charles Manuel, Jorge Vasconcellos, José Leonardo, Sergio Cantu Diretor: Tetsuro Araki
programme.desc: Death Note - T01E14

programme.title: 2008. Há evidências que apontam para Misa Amane como o segundo Kira. Gêneros: Anime Elenco: Alexandre Drumond, Ana Lucia, Charles Manuel, Jorge Vasconcellos, José Leonardo, Sergio Cantu Diretor: Tetsuro Araki
programme.desc: Death Note - T01E15

programme.title: 2008. Misa está presa, embora suas lembranças do Death Note tenham sido excluídas. Gêneros: Anime Elenco: Alexandre Drumond, Ana Lucia, Charles Manuel, Jorge Vasconcellos, José Leonardo, Sergio Cantu Diretor: Tetsuro Araki
programme.desc: Death Note - T01E16

programme.title: 2008. Após 50 dias presos os assassinatos continuam, Misa e Light são soltos. Gêneros: Anime Elenco: Alexandre Drumond, Ana Lucia, Charles Manuel, Jorge Vasconcellos, José Leonardo, Sergio Cantu Diretor: Tetsuro Araki
programme.desc: Death Note - T01E17

programme.title: 2008. Apesar de L ainda ser suspeito, Light e Misa (suas memórias de terem sido Kira foram apagadas) voltam ao quartel. Gêneros: Anime Elenco: Alexandre Drumond, Ana Lucia, Charles Manuel, Jorge Vasconcellos, José Leonardo, Sergio Cantu Diretor: Tetsuro Araki
programme.desc: Death Note - T01E18

programme.title: 2008. Matsuda, o elemento do corpo especial encarregado de monitor Misa, decide espionar por conta própria Gêneros: Anime Elenco: Alexandre Drumond, Ana Lucia, Charles Manuel, Jorge Vasconcellos, José Leonardo, Sergio Cantu Diretor: Tetsuro Araki
programme.desc: Death Note - T01E19

programme.title: 2008. A equipe de L descobre que o Grupo Yotsuba está reunida em segredo para discutir a eliminação dos indivíduos que são problemáticos para a sua empresa. Gêneros: Anime Elenco: Alexandre Drumond, Ana Lucia, Charles Manuel, Jorge Vasconcellos, José Leonardo, Sergio Cantu Diretor: Tetsuro Araki

programme.desc: Death Note - T01E21

programme.title: Naruto Shippuden: Um Sonho Impossível - T01E27
programme.desc: 2007. Embora tenha sido envenenada, vovó chiyo usa o últimoantídoto em sakura. Zombando da terna cena entre vovó chiyo e sakura, sasori tenta por fim à vida de vovó chiyo. Mas vovó chiyo revida e derrota sasori. programme.title: Naruto Shippuden: As Feras Ressuscitadas! - T01E28

programme.title: Naruto Shippuden: Kakashi Iluminado - T01E29
programme.desc: 2007. Sakura corre para achar naruto com a vovó chiyo, que está sofrendo com o veneno. Os membros da equipe guy correm paraajudar a equipe kakashi. programme.title: Naruto Shippuden: A Estética De Um Momento - T01E30
programme.desc: 2007. Na Aldeia da Folha, a equipe de Konohamaru foi promovida a Genin e agora está sob a supervisão de Ebisu. Um Naruto mais velho chega à aldeia após uma longa jornada de treinamento com Jiraiya. Naruto Uzumaki está de volta! programme.title: Naruto Shippuden: O Legado - T01E31
programme.desc: 2007. Jiraiya traz notícias altamente secretas de que os Akatsuki entraram em ação. Naruto e Sakura propõem a Kakashi um desafio de sobrevivência. Na Aldeia da Areia, Gaara é o Kazekage agora, e membros da Akatsuki se infiltram na aldeia. programme.title: Naruto Shippuden: A Volta Do Kazekage - T01E32
programme.desc: 2007. As habilidades de Naruto e Sakura forçam Kakashi a usar seu sharingan imediatamente. Naruto lança um jutsu após outro. Sakura usa técnicas ensinadas a ela por Tsunade. Deidara da Akatsuki começa uma operação secreta para se infiltrar na Aldeia da Areia. programme.title: Naruto Shippuden: Um Novo Alvo - T01E33
programme.desc: 2007. Gaara percebe a presença de Deidara e começa uma batalha aérea na areia. O jonin da areia é Yura, um agente da Akatsuki, e a Aldeia da Areia sofre danos. Na Aldeia da Folha, Naruto e Sakura veem o incrível poder de Kakashi. A dupla dá seu golpe final. programme.title: Naruto Shippuden: Formação! A Nova Equipe Kakashi - T01E34
programme.desc: 2007. Naruto e Sakura derrotam Kakashi. Tsunade os nomeia como uma equipe de três liderados por Kakashi, dizendo que agora são todos iguais. Gaara e Deidara continuam sua batalha. programme.title: Naruto Shippuden: Uma Adição Indesejada - T01E35
programme.desc: 2007. Para proteger sua aldeia da argila explosiva de Deidara, Gaara usa seu chakra para criar um escudo. A aldeia é salva a um enorme custo. Gaara fica vulnerável. programme.title: Naruto Shippuden: Sem Título - T01E37
programme.desc: 2007. Temari encontra Kakashi e sua equipe. Naruto explode de raiva pelos Akatsuki. Como também hospeda uma besta de cauda dentro de si, Naruto entende o que Gaara está sofrendo. programme.desc: 2007. Os ninjas tentam salvar Kankuro. Vovó Chiyo, perita em veneno, é chamada. Uma tempestade de areia atrasa Naruto, Sakura e Kakashi. Tsunade se preocupa e envia Guy e sua equipe. O akatsuki e Gaara começam o jutsu de selamento e os nove dragões fantasmas. programme.title: Naruto Shippuden: A Nove Caudas Se Liberta - T01E40
programme.desc: 2007. Sakura trata Kankuro, deixando todos espantados com suas mãos firmes. Vovó Chiyo fica emocionada por Tsunade ter enviado sua própria aprendiz e pela determinação de Sakura. Kankuro fornece informações sobre os Akatsuki. Kakashi envia um cão de caça ninja. programme.desc: Beyblade G-Revolution - T03E19

programme.title: 2003. A etapa egípcia do Campeonato do Mundo culmina com a partida final, destacando a Dinastia F contra a Revolução BBA. Um dia antes da partida, Tyson fez Daichi praticar movimentos com ele que eles normalmente não estão acostumados a fazer. Gêneros: Anime Elenco: Marlowe Gardiner-Heslin, Alex Hood, Gage Knox Diretor: Mitsuo Hashimoto
programme.desc: Beyblade G-Revolution - T03E20

programme.title: 2003. Tyson está sentindo a pressão de ser campeão do mundo. Apesar do aviso de Hiro, uma equipe de televisão o segue por um dia, gravando todos os seus movimentos. Gêneros: Anime Elenco: Marlowe Gardiner-Heslin, Alex Hood, Gage Knox Diretor: Mitsuo Hashimoto
programme.desc: Beyblade G-Revolution - T03E21

programme.title: 2003. Com Lee perdendo para Tala no início da partida, White Tiger X é um jogo perdido, e Kai agora se prepara para lutar pelos Blitzkrieg Boys. programme.sub-title: Ray e Kai o melhor confronto

programme.title: 2023. Yugi usa suas habilidades de jogo natas para virar a mesa contra Duke, mas Duke menciona mais uma regra: todas as criaturas ocupam território no tabuleiro-grade. Gêneros: Anime
programme.desc: Yu-Gi-Oh! - T01E48

programme.title: 2023. Depois que o todo-poderoso Orgoth, o Implacável de Duke deixa toda a esquadra de monstros de Yugi em pedaços, Yugi só tem mais um turno antes de perder todos os seus pontos de vida! Gêneros: Anime
programme.desc: Yu-Gi-Oh! - T01E49

programme.title: 2023. Um cartomante arcano rouba o Enigma do Milênio, e Yugi precisa defendê-lo em um duelo para recuperá-lo! No entanto, não se trata de um simples advinho. Ele é um inimigo familiar e formidável do Reino dos Duelistas. Ou talvez não? Gêneros: Anime Diretor: Toru Yamada, Hiroyuki Kakudo, Kunihisa Sugishima
programme.desc: Yu-Gi-Oh! - T02E01

programme.title: 2023. A misteriosa ameaça que controla Bandit Keith estilhaça o Enigma do Milênio antes de atear fogo na arena de duelos! Será que Yugi consegue remontar o Enigma do Milênio e salvar o espírito antes que tudo seja engolido pelas chamas? Gêneros: Anime Diretor: Toru Yamada, Hiroyuki Kakudo, Kunihisa Sugishima
programme.desc: Yu-Gi-Oh! - T02E02

programme.title: 2023. A origem de Duel Monsters é revelada! Usando a mágica do Colar do Milênio, a historiadora egípcia Ishizu Ishtar mostra a Kaiba como Duel Monsters era jogado milênios atrás! Gêneros: Anime Diretor: Toru Yamada, Hiroyuki Kakudo, Kunihisa Sugishima
programme.desc: Yu-Gi-Oh! - T02E03

programme.title: 2023. O espírito do Enigma do Milênio percebe que suas memórias do Egito antigo se esvaíram, mas Téa o ajudará a descobrir os mistérios de seu passado! No entanto, a busca deles é interrompida pelo duelista dançarino Johnny Steps e seus monstros do rock! Gêneros: Anime Diretor: Toru Yamada, Hiroyuki Kakudo, Kunihisa Sugishima
programme.desc: Yu-Gi-Oh! - T02E04

programme.title: 2023. Yugi descobre que era um faraó poderoso que salvou o mundo 5.000 anos atrás e agora deve salvá-lo de novo! No meio-tempo, Kaiba testa os poderes de Obelisco, o Atormentador, do Deck dos Deuses Egípcios, contra a fúria do Dragão Supremo de Olhos Azuis! Gêneros: Anime Diretor: Toru Yamada, Hiroyuki Kakudo, Kunihisa Sugishima
programme.desc: Yu-Gi-Oh! - T02E05

programme.title: 2023. Joey é forçado a entrar num duelo e pode perder seu precioso Dragão Negro de Olhos Vermelhos para os Caçadores Raros. Embora Joey esmague seus inimigos com sua poderosa armada de monstros, eliminar pontos de vida não é o único caminho para a vitória... Gêneros: Anime Diretor: Toru Yamada, Hiroyuki Kakudo, Kunihisa Sugishima
programme.desc: Yu-Gi-Oh! - T02E06

programme.title: 2023. Hora de dominar novas regras e monstros. Que comece o Torneio da Cidade da Batalha! No primeiro duelo do torneio, Yugi desafia o Caçador Raro para recuperar o Dragão Negro de Olhos Vermelhos de Joey. Gêneros: Anime Diretor: Toru Yamada, Hiroyuki Kakudo, Kunihisa Sugishima
programme.sub-title: Yugi vs. Caçador Raro, Parte 1: Começo de Cidade da Batalha
programme.desc: Yu-Gi-Oh! - T02E07

programme.title: 2023. Yugi se dá conta da estratégia do Caçador Raro de invocar o poderoso Exodia, mas é tarde demais para detê-lo! O Caçador Raro já tem quatro peças de Exodia na mão, e a quinta e última peça é a próxima carta do deck! Gêneros: Anime Diretor: Toru Yamada, Hiroyuki Kakudo, Kunihisa Sugishima
programme.sub-title: Yugi vs. Caçador Raro, Parte 2: Encarando Exodia
programme.desc: Yu-Gi-Oh! - T02E08

programme.title: 2023. O duelista psíquico Espa Roba derrota Rex Raptor tão fácil quanto a um otário, e Joey é o próximo da lista! Quais são as chances de Joey, quando Espa Roba tem a habilidade telepática de ler todas as cartas na mão de Joey? Gêneros: Anime Diretor: Toru Yamada, Hiroyuki Kakudo, Kunihisa Sugishima
programme.desc: Yu-Gi-Oh! - T02E09

programme.title: 2023. Joey descobre que a percepção extrassensorial de Espa Roba é uma farsa, mas ainda está sob seu controle! O Jinzo de Espa Roba não só massacra todos os monstros de Joey, mas fica mais poderoso a cada turno! A sorte de Joey chegou ao fim... Ou talvez não? Gêneros: Anime Diretor: Toru Yamada, Hiroyuki Kakudo, Kunihisa Sugishima
programme.desc: Yu-Gi-Oh! - T02E10

programme.title: 2023. O duelista mágico Arkana transporta Yugi para a arena de duelos mais letal do mundo, em que o perdedor é enviado para o Reino das Sombras! Yugi tem que vencer esse duelo ou perderá muito mais que seu Mago Negro! Gêneros: Anime Diretor: Toru Yamada, Hiroyuki Kakudo, Kunihisa Sugishima
programme.desc: Yu-Gi-Oh! - T02E11

programme.title: 2023. É Mago Negro contra Mago Negro! No entanto, enquanto Yugi só controla um Mago Negro, Arkana tem três em seu deck! Embora excedido em número, Yugi jamais desistirá, desde que continue confiando no coração das cartas! Gêneros: Anime Diretor: Toru Yamada, Hiroyuki Kakudo, Kunihisa Sugishima
programme.desc: Yu-Gi-Oh! - T02E12

programme.title: 2023. Para encarar o Mago Negro de Arkana, Yugi tira um coelho da cartola: a Pequena Maga Negra! É a batalha dos sexos, para determinar o verdadeiro mestre dos magos! Gêneros: Anime Diretor: Toru Yamada, Hiroyuki Kakudo, Kunihisa Sugishima
programme.desc: Yu-Gi-Oh! - T02E13

programme.title: 2023. O trapaceiro Weevil Underwood tece uma teia de mentiras para atrair Joey para um duelo desequilibrado! Weevil secretamente infesta o deck de Joey com um parasita que impede que Joey invoque monstros fortes! Gêneros: Anime Diretor: Toru Yamada, Hiroyuki Kakudo, Kunihisa Sugishima
programme.desc: Yu-Gi-Oh! - T02E14

programme.title: 2023. Joey esmaga a Grande Mariposa Perfeitamente Suprema, mas Weevil solta a feroz Rainha dos Insetos, a joia suprema dos insetos, que fica mais forte com cada inseto horripilante que ela canibaliza! Será que a devastadora real de Will Weevil subjugará Joey? Gêneros: Anime Diretor: Toru Yamada, Hiroyuki Kakudo, Kunihisa Sugishima
programme.desc: Yu-Gi-Oh! - T02E15

programme.title: 2023. Yugi enfrenta outro dos Caçadores Raros nefandos de Marik – o silencioso, mas mortal Strings! Strings detém todos os ataques de Yugi com Geleia Renascida, uma gosma escorregadia que ressuscita sempre que é destruída! Gêneros: Anime Diretor: Toru Yamada, Hiroyuki Kakudo, Kunihisa Sugishima
programme.desc: Yu-Gi-Oh! - T02E16

programme.title: 2023. Strings invoca uma das criaturas mais poderosas da história de Duel Monsters... o monstro deus egípcio Slifer, O Dragão Celeste! Quais são as chances da esquadra de monstros mortais de Yugi contra um deus egípcio? Gêneros: Anime Diretor: Toru Yamada, Hiroyuki Kakudo, Kunihisa Sugishima
programme.desc: Yu-Gi-Oh! - T02E17

programme.title: 2023. O feitiço Cartas Infinitas permite que Strings mantenha um número ilimitado de cartas na mão. Assim, Slifer, O Dragão Celeste de Strings pode desenvolver poder de ataque infinito! Gêneros: Anime Diretor: Toru Yamada, Hiroyuki Kakudo, Kunihisa Sugishima
programme.desc: Yu-Gi-Oh! - T02E18

programme.title: 2023. Joey luta contra o duelista do mar Mako Tsunami e seu grupo de bestas marinhas! Se Joey vencer, ele terá todas as seis Cartas Localizadoras necessárias para entrar nos Duelos Finais da Cidade de Batalhas. Se ele perder, ele não terá chances! Gêneros: Anime Diretor: Toru Yamada, Hiroyuki Kakudo, Kunihisa Sugishima
programme.desc: Yu-Gi-Oh! - T02E19

programme.title: 2023. O guerreiro oceânico de Mako O Pescador Lendário libera uma onda de destruição, destruindo os monstros de Joey das profundezas do mar sorrateiramente! As habilidades, treino e experiência de Joey serão testados ao extremo antes de ele ser liquidado. Gêneros: Anime Diretor: Toru Yamada, Hiroyuki Kakudo, Kunihisa Sugishima
programme.desc: Yu-Gi-Oh! - T02E20

programme.title: 2023. Abduções abundantes! Marik, com a ajuda de Bakura, sequestra Joey e Téa! Para piorar as coisas, os Caçadores Raros também sequestram Mokuba para forçar Yugi e Kaiba a enfrentarem a dupla de duelistas Umbra e Lumis no topo de um arranha-céus! Gêneros: Anime Diretor: Toru Yamada, Hiroyuki Kakudo, Kunihisa Sugishima
programme.sub-title: Duelo Duplo, Parte 1: Yugi e Kaiba vs. Lumis e Umbra
programme.desc: Yu-Gi-Oh! - T02E21

programme.title: 2023. programme.desc: A 40-year-old disappears on the second night of a cruise, her family is left searching for answers and it ends up changing the way missing persons are reported at sea.

programme.title: Double Life
programme.desc: A grieving widow learns from her late husbands mistress that his death was no accident. The two women form an unlikely alliance to uncover the truth behind his murder and unmask the man they both loved. Starring Javicia Leslie, Pascale Hutton, Niall Matter.

programme.title: My Sisters Double Life
programme.desc: When Chelseas sister vanishes after a late-night shift at a diner, she tries to convince the police that shes been abducted. Racing against the clock, she soon discovers that her sisters captor is now after her as well. Starring Sarah Grey, Amalia Williamson, Cody Ray Thompson.

programme.title: Some Other Woman
programme.desc: Eve sees a strange woman watching her and her husband from outside their home. As the stranger slowly intrudes further into their lives, Eve begins to question if shes losing her mind or her husbands loyalty. Starring Tom Felton, Amanda Crew, Ashley Greene.

programme.title: Cruise Ship Killers
programme.desc: A family of four takes a cruise of a lifetime, but only three return home; their desperate search for their missing adult daughter begins, with all signs pointing to a kidnapping.

programme.title: Mom vs. Matchmaker

programme.title: Kill Victoria
programme.desc: One night, a quartet of best friends jokingly speculate on how they would kill Victoria, in order to save their best friend from making the worst mistake of his life by marrying her. Things go south when the jokes become reality. Starring Robin Dunne, Sara Canning, Aaron Poole.

programme.title: The Birdcage (1996)
programme.desc: In Miami Beach, a gay couple pretend to be man and wife when a sons future father-in-law and family visit.

programme.title: In and Out (1997)
programme.desc: An actors (Matt Dillon) comment stirs media speculation about his prim Midwestern teachers (Kevin Kline) sexuality.

programme.title: Red Dawn (2012)
programme.desc: After foreign troops seize control of an American town, a group of young people takes refuge in the surrounding woods and launches guerrilla attacks against the enemy.

programme.title: Harts War (2002)
programme.desc: A conniving colonel (Bruce Willis) oversees the murder trial of a black airman (Terrence Howard) in a Nazi prisoner-of-war camp.

programme.title: Vanished
programme.desc: Alices doubts about Tom grow as she uncovers his secret ties; after a deadly encounter, she takes a new identity to learn the truth.

programme.title: Jerry Maguire (1996)
programme.desc: A Los Angeles sports agent (Tom Cruise) finds love with a pretty accountant (Renee Zellweger) after an attack of conscience costs him his job and fiancee.

programme.title: The Legend of Bagger Vance (2000)
programme.desc: A golf caddy (Will Smith) shows a disillusioned young war veteran (Matt Damon) how to master challenges and find meaning in life.

programme.title: Better Man (2024)
programme.desc: The true story of the meteoric rise, dramatic fall, and remarkable resurgence of British pop superstar Robbie Williams.

programme.title: Red River (1948)
programme.desc: A cattle baron (John Wayne) fights with his foster son (Montgomery Clift) on the first cattle drive up the Chisholm Trail.

programme.title: Unprotected Sets
programme.desc: After serving three tours of duty on the front lines of Afghanistan and Iraq for the U.S. Army, Raul Sanchez seeks the comfort of comedy to help with his post-traumatic stress disorder; his act highlights the lighter side of everyday life and war.

programme.title: Summer Days, Summer Nights (2018)
programme.desc: On the south shore of Long Island in the summer of 1983, a group of working-class teenagers and 20-somethings work their summer jobs, fall in and out of love, and wrestle with what the future holds when the summer ends and the real world beckons.

programme.title: Run the Tide (2016)
programme.desc: When his drug-addicted mother leaves prison, a man (Taylor Lautner) kidnaps his younger brother (Nico Christou) and flees to the California coast for a better life.

programme.title: Serpico (1973)
programme.desc: Based on the true story of Frank Serpico, who sacrificed his career to expose widespread corruption in the NYPD.

programme.title: Dark Blue (2002)
programme.desc: A rookie policeman (Scott Speedman) objects when his hard-edged partner (Kurt Russell) conspires with his mentor (Brendan Gleeson) to pin murders on two ex-convicts.

programme.title: Blown Away (1994)
programme.desc: An Irish explosive expert targets an old foe and his family living in Boston.

programme.title: True Grit (2010)
programme.desc: A teenage girl (Hailee Steinfeld) enlists the aid of a boozy, trigger-happy lawman (Jeff Bridges) to hunt down her fathers killer (Josh Brolin).

programme.title: The Core (2003)
programme.desc: In order to save mankind, scientists and astronauts must set off a nuclear device at the center of the Earth.

programme.title: Transformers (2007)
programme.desc: An ancient struggle between two Cybertronian races, the heroic Autobots and the evil Decepticons, comes to Earth, with a clue to the ultimate power held by a teenager.

programme.title: Transformers: Revenge of the Fallen (2009)
programme.desc: Sam Witwicky leaves the Autobots behind for a normal life. But when his mind is filled with cryptic symbols, the Decepticons target him, and he is dragged back into the Transformers war.

programme.title: Stargate (1994)
programme.desc: A portal takes an Egyptologist (James Spader), a colonel (Kurt Russell) and a team of soldiers to another planet with pyramids, slaves and an alien ruler.

programme.title: Death on the Nile (1978)
programme.desc: Agatha Christies Belgian sleuth, Hercule Poirot (Peter Ustinov), solves the shipboard murder of an American heiress.

programme.title: Vanished
programme.desc: Alices doubts about Tom grow as she uncovers his secret ties; after a deadly encounter, she takes a new identity to learn the truth.

programme.title: The Machinist (2004)
programme.desc: Cryptic notes and encounters with a mysterious stranger torment a drill-press operator (Christian Bale) who has not slept in a year.

programme.title: The Wasp (2024)
programme.desc: Two estranged friends unveil a dangerous and deceptive plot that forever changes their lives.

programme.title: Amistad (1997)
programme.desc: U.S. lawyers (Anthony Hopkins, Matthew McConaughey) defend Africans who revolted against their Spanish captors aboard a slave ship in 1839.

programme.title: Rob Roy (1995)
programme.desc: The Scottish folk hero (Liam Neeson) fights for clan and honor, hunted by vile aristocrats in the 1700s.

programme.title: Congo (1995)
programme.desc: Killer gorillas menace an ex-CIA agent (Laura Linney), a primatologist (Dylan Walsh) and others on a mission in Africa.

programme.title: Scream 2 (1997)
programme.desc: A masked killer continues to pursue a California student (Neve Campbell) and her friends at an Ohio college.

programme.title: Scream 3 (2000)
programme.desc: Murders draw a young woman (Neve Campbell), a reporter (Courteney Cox Arquette) and an ex-policeman (David Arquette) to the set of a movie inspired by horrific events that they survived.

programme.title: The Saint (1997)
programme.desc: A clever thief who is known as the master of creating false identities using the names of Catholic saints, is hired by the Russian Mafia for his next mission. But things get complicated when he falls for Emma Russel, the scientist.

programme.title: The Cut (2024)
programme.desc: Given one last shot at glory, a former boxing champion has just six days to make weight for a title fight. His obsession soon leaves him at the mercy of a notorious trainer who takes every last ounce from his mind, body and soul.

programme.title: Get Rich or Die Tryin (2005)
programme.desc: When his world spirals out of control, a drug dealer wants to leave his violent life behind and pursue his dream of becoming a rap artist. He channels the same manic intensity to his writing as he does to dealing.

programme.title: Black Lotus (2023)
programme.desc: A soldier uses his military training to rescue the kidnapped daughter of his dead friend.

programme.title: McEnroe (2022)
programme.desc: John McEnroe finally tells his side of his storied career and performances on the court.

programme.title: Face/Off (1997)
programme.desc: An FBI agent (John Travolta) and his nemesis (Nicolas Cage) trade physical identities.

programme.title: Mourning in Lod (2023)
programme.desc: The fates of three families become inextricably intertwined when a Palestinian citizen is killed by a Jewish settler in the city of Lod, Israel, and deadly riots break out.

programme.title: The Lookout (2007)
programme.desc: A brain-damaged former athlete (Joseph Gordon-Levitt) finds himself pulled into a heist at the bank where he works as a janitor.

programme.title: The Outlaws (2024)
programme.desc: A group of outlaws awaken to their empty train heist bag. Interrogations begin as each cowboy becomes the focus in an attempt to unmask the thief among them. Tensions mount as each bandit struggles to clear their name before bullets fly.

programme.title: The Beldham (2024)
programme.desc: A struggling new mother fights a generations-old presence lurking within her familys home, threatening her safety, her sanity, and the life of her infant child.

programme.title: The Haunting (1999)
programme.desc: A parapsychologist and three others stay in a house reputed to be the site of many awful tragedies and paranormal events.

programme.title: Gone Baby Gone (2007)
programme.desc: Two private investigators (Casey Affleck, Michelle Monaghan) tread dangerous ground as they scour the Boston underworld for a kidnapped child.

programme.title: Scream (1996)
programme.desc: A psycho killer targets a past victims daughter (Neve Campbell), while a tabloid TV reporter (Courteney Cox) homes in on his identity.

programme.title: Changeland (2019)
programme.desc: A man meets up with his best friend in Thailand while going through a personal crisis.

programme.title: Face/Off (1997)
programme.desc: An FBI agent (John Travolta) and his nemesis (Nicolas Cage) trade physical identities.

programme.title: Love, Sex and Robots (2024)
programme.desc: Wild women get it on.

programme.title: The Original Kings of Comedy (2000)
programme.desc: Spike Lee directed this document of an evening of stand-up comedy performed by four prominent black entertainers.

programme.title: Jackass Presents: Bad Grandpa (2013)
programme.desc: Irving Zisman (Johnny Knoxville) takes his young and impressionable grandson (Jackson Nicoll) on a cross-country trip in which they encounter male strippers, biker-bar patrons and other unsuspecting citizens.

programme.title: Star Trek: First Contact (1996)
programme.desc: Picard (Patrick Stewart), Riker (Jonathan Frakes) and the others set off to stop the half-robot Borg from sabotaging the first warp drive flight in 2063.

programme.title: Witness (1985)
programme.desc: An eight-year-old Amish boy witnesses a drug-related murder in a Philadelphia train station. The Philadelphia police captain discovers that the murderers are cops trying to squelch a corruption investigation.

programme.title: Wander (2020)
programme.desc: Hired to investigate a suspicious death in the town of Wander, a paranoid private eye with a troubled past becomes convinced the case is linked to the same conspiracy and cover-up that caused the death of his daughter.

programme.title: Pixie (2020)
programme.desc: Pixie sets out to avenge her mothers death and attempts a heist that will give her the means to leave her small-town life behind. When the plan goes horribly wrong, shes forced to team up with a pair of misfits who are clearly in over their heads.

programme.title: Sweeney Todd: The Demon Barber of Fleet Street (2007)
programme.sub-title: Sweeney Todd: The Demon Barber of Fleet Street (2007)
programme.desc: After serving time for a crime he did not commit, a vengeful barber (Johnny Depp) and his accomplice (Helena Bonham Carter) carve up unlucky customers and bake them in meat pies.

programme.title: Baby Driver (2017)
programme.desc: Coerced into working for a crime boss, a talented getaway driver must face the music when a doomed heist threatens his life, love and freedom.

programme.title: No Country for Old Men (2007)
programme.desc: An aging lawman (Tommy Lee Jones) reflects on his past and laments a changing world while trying to find and protect a hunter who took the cash from a drug deal gone bad.

programme.title: Indiana Jones and the Raiders of the Lost Ark (1981)
programme.sub-title: Indiana Jones and the Raiders of the Lost Ark (1981)
programme.desc: Globe-trotting archaeologist Indiana Jones races the Nazis for possession of a legendary religious artifact.

programme.title: Indiana Jones and the Temple of Doom (1984)
programme.sub-title: Indiana Jones and the Temple of Doom (1984)
programme.desc: In 1935 archaeologist Jones (Harrison Ford), a lounge singer (Kate Capshaw) and a Chinese orphan (Ke Huy Quan) search for mystical stones stolen from an Indian tribe.

programme.title: Indiana Jones and the Last Crusade (1989)
programme.sub-title: Indiana Jones and the Last Crusade (1989)
programme.desc: Archaeologist Jones (Harrison Ford) rescues his kidnapped father (Sean Connery), and the two race the Nazis to find the Holy Grail.

programme.title: Indiana Jones and the Kingdom of the Crystal Skull (2008)
programme.sub-title: Indiana Jones and the Kingdom of the Crystal Skull (2008)
programme.desc: Indy (Harrison Ford) and a young adventurer (Shia La Beouf) must ferret out a powerful artifact and keep it out of the hands of a deadly Soviet agent (Cate Blanchett).

programme.title: Deadlock (2021)
programme.desc: A retired Army ranger must save thousands of innocent lives when a rogue team of mercenaries brutally seizes an energy plant and holds everyone inside hostage.

programme.title: The Salvation (2014)
programme.desc: After shooting the man who murdered his wife, a Danish settler (Mads Mikkelsen) incurs the wrath of the mans brother (Jeffrey Dean Morgan), a ruthless land baron who rules their frontier town.

programme.title: The Survivalist (2021)
programme.desc: A year and a half after the fall of civilization due to a viral outbreak, a former FBI agent is forced to protect a young woman immune to the disease from a dangerous gang leader hunting her.

programme.title: Freedoms Path (2022)
programme.desc: When Union soldier William runs from battle, hes taken to safety by a heroic young Black man. Kitch is part of a secret community of freed slaves running a section of the Underground Railroad, but a desperate slave catcher is on their trail.

programme.title: Before Dawn (2024)
programme.desc: A young man joins his countrymen on the Western front of World War I, hoping to expedite an end to the bloody conflict. However, as the battle rages on, hes forced to grapple with the brutal realities of trench warfare.

programme.title: American Renegades (2017)
programme.desc: On assignment in war-torn Europe, Navy SEALs discover gold at the bottom of a lake -- a fortune rumored to be worth hundreds of millions of dollars. When the enemy detects the team, the SEALs are left with only 10 hours to recover the treasure.

programme.title: Black Lotus (2023)
programme.desc: A soldier uses his military training to rescue the kidnapped daughter of his dead friend.

programme.title: The Last Castle (2001)
programme.desc: A court-martialed general (Robert Redford) leads a revolt against a corrupt warden (James Gandolfini) in a military prison.

programme.title: Anything Else (2003)
programme.desc: A writer (Jason Biggs) has problems with his live-in girlfriend (Christina Ricci) and an obsessive teacher (Woody Allen) with a history of mental illness.

programme.title: Jane Eyre (1996)
programme.desc: Charlotte Brontës gothic heroine loves her moody employer, who keeps a dark secret hidden from her.

programme.title: Becoming Jane (2007)
programme.desc: Though her parents expect her to marry a wealthy suitor, young Jane Austen (Anne Hathaway) becomes involved with a penniless lawyer (James McAvoy) who inspires her future writings.

programme.title: Match Point (2005)
programme.desc: A one-time tennis professional (Jonathan Rhys-Meyers) becomes obsessed with his brother-in-laws (Matthew Goode) seductive fiancee (Scarlett Johansson).

programme.title: The To Do List (2013)
programme.desc: Determined to shed her uptight image, a high-school valedictorian (Aubrey Plaza) decides to lose her virginity before college begins. Realizing that she is out of her depth, she asks friends and family for advice.

programme.title: Alfie (2004)
programme.desc: A Londoner (Jude Law) continues his womanizing ways while working as a chauffeur in New York.

programme.title: Nobodys Fool (2018)
programme.desc: Wild child Tanya looks to her buttoned-up, by-the-book sister Danica to help her get back on her feet. As these polar opposites collide, Tanya soon discovers that Danicas picture-perfect life and boyfriend may not be what they seem.

programme.title: Marvelous and the Black Hole (2021)
programme.desc: A rebellious 13-year-old who is dealing with the loss of her mother embarks on an adventure with a childrens party magician.

programme.title: Blue Eyed Girl (2025)
programme.desc: Summoned home to visit her two sisters and her ailing father, a woman starts to re-evaluate her life as she wonders what could have been.

programme.title: The Silent Planet (2024)
programme.desc: Serving a life sentence alone on a distant planet, an aging convict must confront his past when a new prisoner arrives and forces him to remember his life on Earth.

programme.title: Seaside (2018)
programme.desc: A woman decides to run away to the Oregon coast with her boyfriend when he inherits a family beach house.

programme.title: About Adam (2000)
programme.desc: A magnetic young man (Stuart Townsend) meets and romances an Irish waitress (Kate Hudson), then courts and beds the rest of the family.

programme.title: Shes Out of My League (2010)
programme.desc: An airport security agent must figure out how to make the relationship work when a beautiful, successful woman falls in love with him.

programme.title: Jennys Wedding (2015)
programme.desc: When Jenny (Katherine Heigl) decides to marry a woman (Alexis Bledel), her conventional family must accept who she is or risk losing her forever.

programme.title: Boys and Girls (2000)
programme.desc: Two longtime friends (Freddie Prinze Jr., Claire Forlani), each with a string of failed romances, wonder if they should date each other.

programme.title: Down to You (2000)
programme.desc: Two collegians (Freddie Prinze Jr., Julia Stiles) fall in love but have a bumpy affair due to mischievous roommates and the temptation to stray.

programme.title: The Curious Case of Benjamin Button (2008)
programme.sub-title: The Curious Case of Benjamin Button (2008)
programme.desc: Benjamin Button (Brad Pitt) is born an old man in 1918 New Orleans and ages in reverse and, in so doing, becomes intimately familiar with the natures of love and death.

programme.title: Forces of Nature (1999)
programme.desc: A bridegroom (Ben Affleck) hurries by plane to his wedding, but he and his seatmate (Sandra Bullock) must find other modes of travel.

programme.title: I Used to Go Here (2020)
programme.desc: A successful author finds herself deeply enmeshed in the lives of a group of college students after being asked to speak at her alma mater.

programme.title: Pretty Red Dress (2022)
programme.desc: The story of Travis, Candice and their daughter, Kenisha, and their relationships with the same red dress.

programme.title: Marvins Room (1996)
programme.desc: A Florida leukemia patient (Diane Keaton) needs her sisters (Meryl Streep) bone marrow, but first they must end a 20-year feud.

programme.title: The Hours (2002)
programme.desc: The writings of Virginia Woolf (Nicole Kidman) affect a housewife (Julianne Moore) and emulate the life of a New Yorker (Meryl Streep) who is in love with a dying poet.

programme.title: Queen Bees (2021)
programme.desc: While her house undergoes repairs, fiercely independent senior Helen temporarily moves into a nearby retirement community, where she encounters lusty widows, cutthroat bridge tournaments and a hotbed of bullying "mean girls."

programme.title: Flashdance (1983)
programme.desc: A Pittsburgh welder works days, dances in a bar at night, dates her boss and chases the dream of acceptance into a prestigious ballet school.

programme.title: Mothers Day (2016)
programme.desc: As Mothers Day draws near, a single mom (Jennifer Aniston) learns that her ex-husband (Timothy Olyphant) is marrying a younger woman (Shay Mitchell), while a recently widowed man (Jason Sudeikis) struggles to raise his two daughters.

programme.title: The Edge of Seventeen (2016)
programme.desc: A high school junior (Hailee Steinfeld) develops an unexpected bond with a thoughtful teen (Hayden Szeto) after learning that her best friend (Haley Lu Richardson) is dating her older brother (Blake Jenner).

programme.title: Shes the Man (2006)
programme.desc: Romantic complications ensue when a student poses as her twin brother and replaces him at his boarding school.

programme.title: Grease 2 (1982)
programme.desc: A square British exchange student (Maxwell Caulfield) turns hip motorcyclist to woo a cool girl (Michelle Pfeiffer) in his 1961 high school.

programme.title: Flashdance (1983)
programme.desc: A Pittsburgh welder works days, dances in a bar at night, dates her boss and chases the dream of acceptance into a prestigious ballet school.

programme.title: Shakespeare in Love (1998)
programme.desc: Young William Shakespeare (Joseph Fiennes) falls for Viola (Gwyneth Paltrow), reawakening his creativity, but she is betrothed to Wessex.

programme.title: The Edge of Seventeen (2016)
programme.desc: A high school junior (Hailee Steinfeld) develops an unexpected bond with a thoughtful teen (Hayden Szeto) after learning that her best friend (Haley Lu Richardson) is dating her older brother (Blake Jenner).

programme.title: Mothers Day (2016)
programme.desc: As Mothers Day draws near, a single mom (Jennifer Aniston) learns that her ex-husband (Timothy Olyphant) is marrying a younger woman (Shay Mitchell), while a recently widowed man (Jason Sudeikis) struggles to raise his two daughters.

programme.title: Camp X-Ray (2014)
programme.desc: A female guard at Guantánamo Bay forms an unlikely friendship with one of the facilitys longtime detainees.

programme.title: Regarding Us (2025)
programme.desc: After losing her teaching career, A transgender woman has a profound impact on the lives of two children.

programme.title: The Argument (2020)
programme.desc: When a couple argue about a party and neither will back down, they decide to re-create the evening to determine who is right.

programme.title: Kate and Leopold (2001)
programme.desc: A Manhattan woman (Meg Ryan) falls in love with the 19th-century Duke of Albany (Hugh Jackman) who has stepped through a time portal.

programme.title: The Prince and Me (2004)
programme.desc: Paige, a premedical student, falls in love with Eddie, a Danish prince, who keeps his identity a secret.

programme.title: Runaway Bride (1999)
programme.desc: A New York reporter (Richard Gere) travels to Maryland to profile a woman (Julia Roberts) who left three bridegrooms at the altar.

programme.title: Bridget Joness Baby (2016)
programme.desc: Befuddled mom-to-be Bridget Jones (Renee Zellweger) must figure out which of the two men (Colin Firth, Patrick Dempsey) in her life is the father of her child.

programme.title: Winter Spring Summer or Fall (2024)
programme.desc: Young Remi has her future figured out, until she meets Barnes, who lives for the moment and makes her question everything. As their love story unfolds, she faces a choice -- stick to her plan or risk it all for a life she never saw coming.
